title: 人间奥义资金盘 （下） 转载自币乎 比特傻
body:
北京已经进入深秋，马上就要进入寒冬了。我国经济也进入了深秋，彻骨严寒，窗外的树叶簌簌落下。未来会怎样呢？比特傻并不知道。比特傻只知道，又到了吃火锅、泡温泉和滑雪的季节了。择三五好友一起，畅享自由，如此人生不老。

这几天一老哥在群里老是找大家琢磨找怎么设计套路。一会儿保险互助、一会儿就业互助、一会儿健康互助。老哥其实是智力水准超过很多人的高知。很多人其实小瞧了资金盘，即便是骗人的资金盘，其产品设计也有上乘之作，直击人性的弱点和迷惘。

感恩币乎，让我们有机会把资金盘这个话题说完、说透。感恩大家关心，写完币圈重要的资金盘现象，《彼岸系列》就更加丰满了。在之前的文章里面，我们说完了资金盘的基础认知和比特傻所划分的四类资金盘。今天，我们来说年轻人对资金盘的科学态度和资金盘的社会意义。

年轻人对待资金盘的科学态度

之前，比特傻写了上一篇《人间奥义资金盘（上）》，微博上有批评的声音，说我不该去说资金盘。可比特傻总认为年轻人对于资金盘其实要有科学的态度的。广义上，货币、房地产、美元的霸权、全球政治格局、社保公积金、证券市场等都可以用资金盘的角度去理解。你们真的可以选择一味回避吗？

除了老生常谈的资金盘风险，比特傻也指出资金盘中有年轻人改变命运的力量。比如某欧就是炒房逆袭的，杨永兴就是从股市逆袭的。你们可以把比特傻看做一个经济学家，了解真相是我的兴趣，但真相不符合价值观的时候，我就尽量少说吧。尽管很多人意识不到，和常识、价值观违背的真相，很多都包含了财富密码。改变不了自己思维定式的人，在波澜诡谲的社会中，难有大出息。

认识到先来者优势：

年轻人应该意识到普遍上资金盘是先来者占优，割后来者的。常见的资金盘，先来者获利概率较高，后来者概率获利较低。这是因为要解决资金盘冷启动的问题。以往这样的设计很容易短期崩盘。后来，设计者学聪明了，弄个奖池。虽然从概率看后来者获利还是越来越低，但人皆短视看，这看起来越发膨胀的奖池也能够增加资金盘的寿命。

正因为如此，那些对机会敏感，总能率先发现机会的年轻人，才有机会打败迟钝的富二代。

看透收割顺序：

年轻人还需要具备看透资金盘收割顺序的能力，这是很考验年轻人的才智的。任何一个资金盘，高手应该一眼看出谁在收割谁。看透收割顺序，才能不做羔羊。193D

福莫3D，下放黑客高手收割手动操作者，手段是利用随机数算法的破绽薅空投羊毛，并且可以低成本撸最后大奖。

稚童只知道代码写在区块链公正透明，欢天喜地地去掏钱了，高手却看到规则里的破绽和收割顺序。资金盘里的信息不对称必然存在。然而更多的是能力不对称。资金盘不是单纯的收割，还包含着按照智商的财富再分配。

想象下吧，对弈时，你在研究将棋盘激烈的杀招和出路，突然，对面一脚踩爆棋盘，对你一阵拳打脚踢。你趴在地上、流着血，明白了自己被“规则打击”了吗？屋子里的傻瓜是谁？几个人打牌，打了几圈你还没有发现傻瓜是谁，那么你就是那个傻瓜。K线画图时；你在找涨跌规律，人家也在找割你的规律；

斟酌资金盘附着模式：

通常能赚快钱的业务很多都是资金盘。通常资金盘操盘方需要圈钱且承担法律风险，资金盘投资人需要火中取栗。长期看，这两种模式都难以有好结局。资金盘如同春药，吃一下猛一发，但最终逃脱不了地心引力般的价值回归。但确实，其爆发力超过踏踏实实做事创造价值。

如果不想有大风险，就附着在资金盘上，吸收资金盘的爆发力。在币圈，诸如交易所、挖矿、市值管理业务等。

别理解错了，我不建议大家直接玩资金盘，适合亡命之徒，不适合未来美好的你。至于附着在资金盘之上，吸收资金盘的爆发力，足以使平民殷实越升。近几年比特傻见经济不景，很多年轻人拼命改变命运而夭折，于心不忍，就指出这条路。取否取否，人各有志吧。

认知跨越几代人的资金盘：

前文提到跨越好几代人的资金盘。人生面对这类型的资金盘，不得不选择。你在40岁之后，能力精力衰退，要想清楚谁在给你抬轿子。如果你有一线城市核心地产，则有外来的年轻人口给你抬轿子。如果你在互联网公司当高管，则有很多985毕业的年轻人给你抬轿子。如果你在基金上班，则有无数年轻人拼命干好你的项目，给你抬轿子。地产也好、互联网也好、基金也罢。这些难道不是后来者给前者抬轿子吗？

人生的可怜之处在于40岁之后，手中还没有握有一些年轻人不得不给你抬轿子的资产。如果你不想成为这样的可怜人，你就需要认知这些跨越几代人的资金盘，并有所行动。

资金盘的社会学意义

比特傻读书时，有两年每周去教堂。我有个很好的牧师，和蔼可亲。在异国他乡，给了我很多关爱并交给了我很多做人的道理。我和牧师说，我感激他个人的帮助，但不因为这种感激而笃信基督。

可我至今依然忘不了牧师对我说的话：不一定每一个个体都需要宗教，但宗教的社会学意义巨大。比特傻心里总是觉得信仰的本质是骗局，坚定唯物，可也会遇到脆弱的时候，困难的时候。

这让我联想到对资金盘的认知，不一定每一个个体都需要资金盘，但社会的运行难以离开资金盘。纯粹依靠资金盘运行的社会是灾难。纯粹依靠价值创造运行的社会也是灾难。比如老人是社会的负债，如果没有资金盘维系的医疗、保险和退休金机制，他们的生存堪忧。\\

为什么说资金盘其实是人间奥义呢？你买了一辆宾利，开始你满心欢喜，后来也会逐渐钝感，归于平静。比特傻早上上班，看到身边的女孩真是青春美好，忍不住多看一眼。下班后看到广场的大妈扭动腰肢，赶紧避开。如果把这些青春靓丽的女孩看成标的物，围绕她们的投入财物和注意力都在衰减，标的价值也在衰减。比特傻追求年轻的女孩，愉悦不已；等到女孩韶华逝去，再花时间和女孩在一起，则毫无波澜。

世间万物，有价值的都会衰退。衰退和价值破灭才是规律，价值永恒才是异类。那怎么解释你会买入一家注定百年后破产公司的股票呢？因为任性不耐，只看眼前。资产衰退和人性不耐，是人世间的奥义。这样的设计固然残忍，却也使得人类社会生生不息，不得不时时创造有价值的美好的东西。资金盘创造了社会流动。

从广义的角度看资金盘。价值创造的事情所占的比例短期看很低。比如短期内，科技进步带来的生产力提升对我们的生活影响很小。短期内信贷这种资金盘却对我们的生活影响很大。放眼望去，社会生活的方方面面几乎都是资金盘。现代金融系统也被资金盘包裹着。然而社会教育和舆论从来教育我们要创造价值，走一条艰辛的路；却从来不会系统性地教导我们怎么从各个大大小小的资金盘中获利。看透资金盘，是现代人社会生存的必备技能之一。

单个资金盘必然奔溃，可是从社会看来资金盘却是生生不息，最终因为短视和贪婪的人性。

结语

上文提到的老哥。有一次他拉比特傻到北京的微商大会去看看。我觉得没啥意思，被他拖到现场。我看到现场无数人头攒动，黑压压一片。老哥问我：你看到了啥？比特傻：人。老哥说：再看！比特傻：还是人，集体无意识的人。老哥说：错了，那些都是行走的人民币！

这真是让比特傻终身难忘的一句话，一般企业家都会想着怎么给用户解决问题；而镰刀的思维方式，看用户都是琢磨怎么割。

时至今日，比特傻终于把自己对资金盘的认知都分享给你了。这三篇文章足以让任何人看清资金盘。如果你还有朋友对资金盘感到困惑，这三篇应该使他豁然开朗、神清气爽。

然而《彼岸系列》还没有结束，比特傻立志打造经典，后面还有重要内容要分享给大家。求真务实，如果这个过程实在有违你的价值观，也请不要生气。你我的生命本就是时间的资金盘，喜怒哀乐是心力的资金盘。理解到这里，比特傻不禁哈哈大笑，弃案而去。

title: 人间奥义资金盘 （中）转载自币乎比特傻
body:
![](https://oss02.bihu.com/image/20191013/59584349a0cea2dd48f5fbe14b6478bf_GY2DAKRRGA3TK.jpg)

比特傻少年时，看到金庸先生的《天龙八部》，扫地僧讲解七十二绝技。少林寺七十二绝技，每一招都是凌厉狠毒；每修炼一层，则戾气增进一分。如果没有修行佛法化解，则修炼者必受尽折磨，痛苦不已。现代社会，资金盘就是类似七十二绝技一般的存在。研习资金盘，需要有足够的自控力和强健的世界观，否则很容易误入歧途。

这段日子，好多读者催我写长文。感恩币乎平台，让我们有缘可以一起进步。上一篇我们已经讲了资金盘的基础认知，今天我会以更大的视角、更加深入剖析资金盘。今天比特傻会告诉大家四种资金盘。不知这篇文章能够在网络保存多久，你能否读到，就看缘分了。

资金盘分类

小时候，比特傻读历史。读到始皇帝设立中央和地方的政治制度。中央是三公诸卿制度。三公总领国政、太尉是最高军事长官、御史大夫监察百官。地方上是郡县制度。把国家权利这么分类，这简直是天才的分类法。比特傻觉得始皇帝不仅仅军事才能卓越；而且政治制度创新也是千古一帝，后来的帝王首脑都难以与之相提并论。政治制度的设计本质是是对整个国家一团乱麻一样的权利进行分类，然后分配。你肯定觉得这又何难？你去看看隔壁的罗马帝国，分崩离析，就没有这样福泽千年的政治遗产。我们的确是神佑的民族。

那币圈的资金盘该怎么分类呢？有人张口就来，说分为良心盘和黑盘。良心盘按照资金盘的套路玩，最终钱不太好募了，入不敷出时卷款跑路。黑盘呢，一上来所有散户和资金盘猎人一把割，1-2个月就跑路。良心盘让赌徒潦倒一生，但当下看是可接受损失。黑盘呢，好家伙，2个月后你第一次提现，就提现不了了。你痛苦万分时，朋友圈里你的下线还在不停发"XX互助，请别再错过！"，简直是魔幻现实主义。连对人生最不负责任的赌徒都要骂上一句：，这也割的太狠了嘛。

可是你这么简单分类啊，就无法看到资金盘更辽阔更深邃的世界。且看比特傻的分类法。

经典资金盘

类似3M互助和易租宝这样的，我把它们叫做经典资金盘。常见的经典资金盘，首先有个温暖的口号，来慰藉赌徒的道德感。比如"善心汇"、"人人有书读"之类的。然后呢，经典资金盘会对你的投资行为、拉新行为进行激励。也就是说你投的越多，拉的人头越多，得到的收益就越高。

经典资金盘一般有着明确的收益承诺，但都是些难以通过正常生意持续获得的收益。3M经典资金盘的收益来源也一般比较扯淡，通常都是靠后来者纳贡，或者少比例投资些不靠谱的项目。收益分配呢，就按照你投资或者拉新的多少以及你在金字塔中的位置进行分配。

通常，经典资金盘会很顺畅地经历启动、拉新膨胀、资金枯竭、奔溃跑路等阶段。没有什么花头，也没有什么意外，无可欣赏之处。依葫芦画瓢，几无创新，十分类似庞氏当年的骗局，让比特傻这样的投资人厌倦。这真是资金盘里面最朴素的一种啊。

弱铸币权资金盘

弱铸币权资金盘在经典资金盘的基础上做了一个小小的变化。你的收益不再是账户余额了，而是可用于二级市场交易的代币。可别小瞧这个小小的变化，这直接导致资金盘属性发生了翻天覆地的变化。

二级市场的代币代替了固定的账户余额，意味着资金盘运营者可以赖账了。本来，资金盘欠你10万块的收益没有给你，你可以不依不饶地找人家去兑现。现在好了，资金盘欠你10万个代币，现在每个币是一块钱。等到你过了提现限制时间，一个月后去提现的时候，每个币就一毛钱了。这下你慌了，人家大大方方告诉你，市场不好，再等几天吧。

其次呢，这种赖账还体现在增发筹码上。运营方相当于在资金盘的小小的交易环境中有了自己的铸币权。我把这种局限的铸币权叫作弱铸币权。那好，有了铸币权自然是印钞了。你辛辛苦苦，吭哧吭哧得发展下线赚来1万枚代币。人家程序员改改代码，一下子增发一个亿的筹码揣兜里。

其次呢，弱铸币权的资金盘还可以在二级市场可以放收益杠杆。本来呢，你为了吸引赌徒玩资金盘，整个盘子用户的待付余额50个亿，你去哪里把这50个亿的窟窿补上呢？有了弱铸币权就好办了，你可以用一个亿拉盘，代币价格蹭蹭往上账，每个人的资产价格都在上涨。上涨预期也稳定了提现数额。于是，你用很小的代价，让所有人获得了表象上的超额收益。这难道不是很美的事情吗？

加特肯特正是因为这种弱铸币权的保障，导致弱铸币权资金盘的生命力比经典资金盘强悍了不少。

强铸币权资金盘

上文说到经典资金盘的拉新，必须要用实打实的收益给高度的激励；弱铸币权的资金盘拉新必须在二级市场拉盘，给人以财富效应；强铸币权资金盘往往伴随着强大的行政能力，能够充分垄断地捆绑在经济这台永动机之上。其拉新方式具有强制性。比如社保公积金，小白领上班不得不交、直接给你扣了；Vc/Pe、房地产都是印钞式拉新，你不理不顾不要紧，直接印钞稀释你的财富，印的钱进入这些领域。

说一句诺贝尔经济学家也说不出来的话。铸币权的强弱本质上在于：能不能绑上一国经济这台永动机。

世间只有一个永动机，那就是源于人类本性孜孜以求的生存和发展。是的，经济体的发展就是永动机。资金盘绑上这台永动机，操作得当，就可以割之不尽，取之不竭。2009年以前，资金盘绑上永动机，都是在最终暴力的支持下，行政权力辅助造成的经济体内的货币垄断模式。控制货币方收割不控制货币的一方。但2009年以后，终于出现了比特币，其去中心化让最终暴力无从碾压，得以生存至今。这个下文再说。

强铸币权往往伴随着强大的行政权力配套。强大的行政权力，可以限制市场的交易行为，可以确立货币作为唯一代币的垄断性，甚至可以向社保公积金那样强制拉新。怕喝咖啡，这里就不展开了。补充一句，广义上，比特傻认为资金盘是中性词。很多强铸币权资金盘运作的好，也能改善国计民生，有利于财富再分配，有利于科技行业发展。

为了方便大家理解，我们就以地产这个跨越好几代人的强铸币权资金盘为例吧。

令我吃惊的房地产的收益承诺是隐形承诺就是房价不会跌且会随着M2上涨。房价跌了人民倾向于砸售楼处。托肯

强铸币权嵌入token的方式:利用行政手段，在一二级市场做各种限购限贷措施，导致交易量变小，这样就可以少量资金拉盘房价上涨。

房地产资金盘的收益来源是M2保障房价、租金和学区、医疗、户籍等福利;拉新方式是利用城镇化进程和M2蓄水池，强制拉新；提现限制有限售限贷，导致半年才卖得出去。：比克特，

房地产资金盘的可玩性：拥有城市系统、地块系统、土拍系统、户籍系统、限购系统、限贷系统、产权系统、租赁系统、学区系统等多个系统，增加了资金盘可玩性。

这样看来，房地产就是一个强铸币权加行政手段维护的强行拉盘、强行拉新、强行保障收益来源的资金盘。牛逼之处还在于政府可以通过"可玩性"中的各大系统干预价格，使得泡沫极难破灭。而且啊，各类型的场外配置手段也被行政权力约束。

这还不算完。你在各类型房地产平台看到的价格都是相互矛盾的。有时候统计局说房价在跌，可是你在小区的真实感受是房价在涨。价格显示都不准，所有参与者都在抹黑开车，神奇吧。

那强铸币权资金盘是否就万无一失了呢？不是的。在强铸币权的情况下，资金盘的体量占铸币权的经济体的体量，占比越小越安全。还是用房地产举例。尽管房地产不全是资金盘，但房地产中的货币和信贷水池及房地产的投机需求无疑是资金盘的一部分。目前房地产及其相关行业占国民经济小一半，就足够让政府心慌了。开始出台各种限购限贷限售限价限离措施。有些资金盘啊，你惹不起，政府也惹不起。不信你看隔壁日本。虽然比特傻不是房v，但是以上用资金盘视角对房地产，在房圈也是独一无二，足以给人启迪。

区块链技术资金盘

区块链技术再次使得资金盘模式得到巨大的进步，典型的就是去中心化盘Fomo3D。

首先，区块链技术使得一个弱小的项目方都可以发币，获得弱铸币权。弱铸币权能够带来什么呢？能够通过二级市场拉盘来放大收益和赖账，这比传统狭义资金盘的资金流压力小，导致资金盘存续周期拉长。其呢，智能合约技术解决了资金盘跑路问题，即使奔溃也奔溃的明明白白，杜绝了人为跑路的风险，且保障了崩盘后收益分配的自动化和智能化。

第三，在玩法上利用智能合约程序增加了很多趣味性，例如最终大奖、战队系统等。最后，这类资金盘敢于直接说自己就是资金盘，不像传统资金盘遮遮掩掩，搞啥大义名分。乃至很多参与者觉得这种盘强于绝大多数ICO，比很多发币的项目方更良心，玩资金盘甚至比炒币更公平，多劳多得。

传统资金盘吧，总是一个庄家带着散户在玩。庄家总是中心化的。在区块链资金盘里，很多情况是散户和计算机算法在玩。庄变成了一套算法，变得去中心化了。福莫德，

福莫德

福莫这样会导致资金盘永不停息的。那怎么解释这样的资金盘会停止呢？

首先，每一个网络都会存在衰退。接近上限资金就会枯竭。其次呢，筹码的价格会逐渐增高，在目测获得大奖的概率很低的情况下，就不再有人投入。第三，最最重要但没人说的原因：理智。人其实会在漫长的疯狂中恢复理智的。

这导致了资金盘的传播发展是有边际效应的，到了一定规模每获取一个成员的成本就会高到大于其带来的资金投入。于是，最终会资金链断裂。当然，在那之前操盘者一定会跑路。

比特傻从来不忌讳说比特币就是资金盘。黄金是资金盘、你的社保账户是资金盘、民国金圆券是资金盘、美元霸权是资金盘、人类社会生生不息发展是资金盘、物种演变是资金盘。和直觉不同，资金盘不一定是骗局。比特币是全球第一个技术手段实现的不可逆的大规模资金盘。

比特币这种去中心化货币属性的资金盘也将会逐渐捆绑上经济体这台永动机。未来啊，也是割之不尽，取之不竭。区别在于，比特币破除了暴力者的空间，是先来者割后来者。这相对于目前的货币体系已是进步，已是进步了。

历史上无数次案例政府利用货币坑百姓。之百姓参与货币民权和货币主权的争夺几千年了，之前最好的工具是黄金。于是黄金这个资金盘，可以几千年不灭亡。而现在，参与货币民权和货币主权的博弈，最好的工具就是比特币。很多情况资金盘是一种恶，但用作对抗更大的恶时，她就是天使。

对了，比特傻再提醒你一句。绑上了国计民生、绑上了一国经济体的、不可逆的资金盘才是最好的投资标的。

最后你可能会问了，如果把区块链技术和强铸币权结合会怎么样？问得好。这就是央行数字货币。是另外一个复杂体系，我们会在后面的文章中仔细去说。

结语

扫地僧说：佛法在求渡世、武功在求杀生。那怎么才能对天下苍生最好呢？主流教育告诉年轻人应该好好创造价值，远离资金盘。比特傻选择道出资金盘的奥义，告诉他们除了修行佛法练习七十二绝技，还可以利用小无相功，在短时间里速成，获得更大的威力。如何取舍，全凭自己。

文章写到这里，已经颇为复杂了。比特傻且先做个小结。

看资金盘啊，先看有没有在二级市场发币。发了币就可以在收益层面赖账、增发筹码和放大参与者的收益。再看有没有绑上经济体这个永动机。绑上了，资金盘就生生不息，通常伴随着标的物和一般等价物的两头垄断。而绑上永动机的手段分为行政权力和去中心化技术。前者往往局限于一国，后者理论上更加不可被消灭、能够跨越主权而存在。但技术手段和生态建设还处在早期。

上一篇文章你学会了对资金盘的基础认知。这一篇你学会了用更大的视角，更深邃的角度看待资金盘。这个资金盘系列注定是充满争议的，但也是独一无二的。

数字货币的大船正在暴雨惊涛中前进，而资金盘是大船边上的一叶扁舟。舟上虽有坐席，但切记，水能载舟，亦能覆舟。

title: Cain&Abel, Narzissmus und Girards mimetische Theorie
body:
Cain und Abel, in den drei abrahamitischen Religionen, als die Söhne Adam und Ewas bekannt, liefern uns die orginelle  Blaupause des Homizids, eine perverse Dreickecks Symbyose, aus Neid, Arroganz und Narzissmus. Kaum ein Mensch, der die Geschichte der Geschwister kennt, wird behaupten, dass obwohl, Abel der von Gott bevorzugte Bruder war, es Cain schlecht erging, absolut gesehen hatte er genau die gleichen materiellen Wohlstände wie sein Bruder, aber relativ gesehen und das ist der springende Punkt, eben nicht. Cain, der wohl der erste Narzisst der Menscheitsgeschichte war, erachtete sich als besser, jemand dem mehr zu steht, knapp gesagt eine von Arroganz und Hybris geplagte Seele. 

*“Der Ausdruck Narzissmus steht  im weitesten Sinne für die Selbstverliebtheit und Selbstbewunderung eines Menschen, der sich für wichtiger und wertvoller einschätzt, als urteilende Beobachter ihn charakterisieren.”* Nun werden einige Leute, sofern sie mit  Rene Girards mimetischer Theorie bekannt sind, bereits erahnen, welche Richtung dieser Artikel einschlagen wird , trotzdem möchte ich noch einmal einen Grundriss eben jener Theorie zügig paraphrisieren und dann ein Synoptikum zwischen Mord Narzissmus und Mimetik erstellen. 

Laut Girard stehen wir Menschen in ständigem Konkurrenzdenken, dem aber nicht genug konkurrieren wir auch noch um die Sachen, die anderer Leute Begehren sind wobei Girard  hier noch einen Schritt weitergeht und gar behauptet, dass der Mensch an sich keine wirklichen Wünsche und Verlangen hat sondern diese immer von anderen Menschen geprägt sind, also ein chaotisches Wechselspiel der Bedürfnise. Wenn wir dieses Konzept nun in unsere heutige Zeit, ein Äon der Negierung höherer Macht/Gottes, verlagern, sehen wir ganz klar und deutlich eine Deifizierung des Menschen. Denn wer ist den nun unser Maßstab nach, welchem wir uns richten sobald wir keinen Gott und dessen Regel akzepitieren? Der Mensch wird selber zum Maßstab, wir messen uns ständig mit anderen Menschen und legen dermaßen viel Wert auf deren Meinung, dass wir sie zu Ersatzgöttern oder besser gesagt Götzen empor gehoben haben, die nun uns beeurteilen obwohl wir ebenso ihn Konkurrenz mit ihnen stehen, pardaox nicht war. 

Kommen wir nun also zur Verbindung dieser unheiligen Dreifaltigkeit im Lichte unserer Zeitepoche und warum dieser Trend wohl akkzelieren und sich fortsezten wird. Wie oben festgehalten beneidet Cain, Abel wegen eines Vergleiches, nicht mehr und nicht weniger, er vergleicht sich mit ihm, stellt fest dass er etwas anscheinend besseres besitze, ist voller Arroganz und entscheidet sich dafür Abel zu ermordern. Cains Narzissmus gepaart mit jenem Vergleichsdenken führende ihn dazu die wohl arroganteste Tat zu begehen und eine Menschenseele auszulöschen. Dieses Vergleichsdenken ist heute dank Social-Media omnipräsent, ebenso werden immer mehr und mehr narzisstische Charakterzüge an den Tag gelegt, generell sprechen manche Soziologen bereits von der narzistischten Generation schlecht hin und was am Anfang der Menscheitsgeschichte zu Blutvergießen geführt hat, kann auch heute wieder dazu führen. Auch wenn so einige moderne Zeitgenossen uns gerne von dem lächerlichen Gedanken überzeugen wollen, dass der Mensch sich verändert hätte und wirklich den Rang eines Gottes einnimmt.

title: 人间奥义资金盘 (上)  转载自币乎比特傻
body:
![](https://oss02.bihu.com/image/20190818/a8aace1050d9a695110319925443509e_GM4TSKRTHE4A.jpg)

《骇客帝国》中，赛弗举着刀叉，说：瞧，我知道这牛排压根不存在，可当我把它放进嘴里，我的大脑就能接收到鲜嫩多汁的信号。比特傻初看《骇客帝国》，惊恐不已。真实与虚幻究竟怎么分辨呢？还是世间从未有过真实？我国古典红楼梦也有云游太虚，对真与幻有过思考。日本文化中，忍术就有幻术这一说，到底是真是幻，让人迷惘。在投资生涯中，比特傻把价值创造看作真，把资金盘看做幻。究竟如何分辨真与幻呢？\\

这些天，比特傻因为工作繁忙，写长文落下了不少。很多网友在币乎、我的微信和微博表示希望看到我的更多长文。感恩大家的关心。此前，我的《彼岸系列》已经把数字货币投资的主要框架分享给大家了。今天比特傻来填充重要的一块知识——资金盘。我们古往今来的经济学，从来都是研究"真"，而不研究"幻"。资金盘中，包含了太多社会"隐学"。受网络环境所限，我尽可能的阐述一二，大家听好了。

资金盘是币圈极为重要的现象。区块链技术也是资金盘的里程碑。生在币圈，不可不学，不可不察。然而很少有人将资金盘说透，很多年轻人还是云里雾里。在这个系列里面，比特傻会逐一讲解资金盘的基础认知、资金盘的属性、资金盘的种类、年轻人对资金盘的科学态度以及资金盘的社会意义。

资金盘基础认知

，巴克特市场因这三万八千枚比特币而恐慌。在币圈，我们无时不刻不在和资金盘打交道。人们常说资金盘，也有说传销，还有人说庞氏骗局。角度各不相同。资金盘体现了资金运作的角度，传销突出传播和销售层面，而庞氏骗局则揭示了对参与者过度承诺的欺骗行为。在本文，我们尽量把资金盘看作一个中性概念，算作是看待世界的一个角度吧。

世间的事业，粗暴分为价值创造和资金盘。创造价值的事情，需要系统方法论，反馈周期十分漫长。小白领去互联网行业上班，需要985毕业，需要家庭财力物力投入二十年。资金盘的事情，反馈刺激快而且猛烈，不需要任何前置投入，村里老太太都可以参加。

通常参与资金盘的有三波人。项目方处在金字塔顶端，收割其他参与者。职业资金盘猎人懂得什么时候进、什么时候出。纯韭菜则是被项目方和资金盘猎人画的十倍百倍收益忽悠的人。但纯韭菜也是知道风险，也十分清楚自己在玩资金盘。他们不具备系统判断资金盘时间节点的能力和信息，只是侥幸地认为自己不是最后一波。

很多人，视角在北上深，怎么也不能理解玩资金盘的人。犹如富人不理解穷人为什么要去喝河里的脏水？为什么不重视子女的教育？玩资金盘的很多人，人生已经输了，他们自己也知道。正是因为在价值创造这条赛道上彻底绝望，机会成本低，所以才去玩资金盘。其次呢，贪婪是如同地心引力一般持续存在的力量。理智总有虚弱的时候，理智一旦松懈，财富就会坠地。绝大多数时刻，资金盘并非骗局，而是一群人的聚众赌博，所有人都心知肚明。

资金盘的属性

类的思维方式，于比特傻而言简直石破天惊，这大概是上帝创造世界时使用的思维方式吧。举个简单的例子，自行车这个类。自行车的属性是：有两个轮子、有脚踏、有把手、有刹车。自行车的功能是：可以骑行。我们会发现，万事万物，在创造伊始，我们需要赋予它属性和功能。编程就是创造的过程，犹如造物一般的快感。我们一起寻着"类"这个思维，一点点考察资金盘的属性。

激励机制：

激励机制说白了就是针对某些特定的行为进行激励。在资金盘里面，我们激励的行为是哪些呢？首先是投资行为，投资可以获得收益。其次呢，是传播行为，拉人头也可以分钱。比如3M互助这个资金盘，投资能够获得日息1%，且针对拉人头也有各种分层奖励和领导人奖励。需要指出的是，激励并非只是钱，还有些社会福利。比如巨龙国公民购买社保，得到的激励就是医疗、生育、失业等保险。巨龙国公民缴纳公积金得到的激励就是公积金贷款服务。是的，在本文中，社保和公积金都是资金盘。我知道这和你理解的不一样，耐心点，后面我会详细说。

项目包装：

资金盘一般有个温暖而大义的口号，诸如“互助”、“善心”、“万福”之类的。人做一件事儿，需要被赋予意义。杀人可以是替天行道；打劫可以是劫富济贫；造反可以是文明革命。同样，人们参与资金盘也需要大义名分。比如诸多传销公司把传销包装成直销。波场超级社区这种寄生资金盘要把自己包装成官方正统项目。P2P这种资金盘要把自己包装成普惠金融。Fcoin这种资金盘要包装成“交易即挖矿”这种开天辟地新模式。

除了大义名分，资金盘的收益来源也要包装。3M互助的收益来源包装成神乎其神的经济“流通收益”。波场超级钱包的收益则包装成节点投票收益。ICO这种资金盘把收益来源包装成各类型价值创造。关于资金盘收益来源的包装，极其考验一个民族的创造力。同时呀，还要学会蹭热度，利用群众的一知半解。比如Plustoken趁着牛市跨市场套利火的很，把收益来源包装成智能搬砖。币圈资金盘的收益来源包装通常是挖矿、搬砖套利、节点收益等。

收益承诺：

除了温暖而大义的口号，资金盘需要对各种传播行为、购买虚拟/实物资产行为、发展下线等行为作出收益承诺。一般的商业也通常鼓励鼓励，鼓励发展下线。比如你给房产销售带客，也能拿到回扣。最大的差别在于资金盘承诺了一种惊人回报。这种惊人回报比如一月翻一倍显然不可能通过创造价值而获得。那只能是后来者的钱给先来的人交收益。

资金盘的收益承诺分为显性承诺、隐形承诺和无承诺。显性承诺的例子大家看得多，各类型P2P年化收益百分之二十。3M互助日息1%。隐形承诺如鹰酱国的股市，政府不惜金融战贸易战也要保住，却不会对老百姓明确承诺。无承诺的资金盘也有，比如Fomo3D的投资收益，项目方不会有任何承诺。

承诺的收益并非越高越好。比特傻反问你们一个问题，为什么目前的资金盘画的K线收益都是几倍十倍百倍这种？为什么不画个1亿倍的涨幅的饼呢？这样不是更加刺激人的贪欲吗？答案：如果有1亿倍的涨幅，大部分人都会只花1块钱玩玩，反正1亿就财务自由了。这会导致资金盘人均出的筹码过低，无法覆盖其人均推广和运营成本，导致资金盘不成立。

真实收益来源：

上面提到对收益来源的包装，那自己盘的真实收益来源是怎么来的呢？通常有这几种情况。首先、第一个收益来源是后来者纳贡。这很好理解，也非常常见。各种ICO项目就是这种类型，二级市场拉盘这种，无人接盘就死。

但是你可别把自己盘想的太过狭隘，还有别的来源。制度套利也是一种收益来源，虽然不多见。比如很多金控集团做的一二级市场套利业务。收购一家10个亿的牛逼概念公司，股票里面涨了100个亿，即是此类。

还有价值创造和后来者纳贡混合型的收入来源。比如P2P和现金贷这个行业。你说P2P做流动性撮合和信息中介有无价值？有的，但价值没这么大。如果一个P2P承诺收益3%，那就是价值创造了。承诺收益15%，就是3%的价值创造和12%的后来者纳贡了。

还有没有别的收益来源？有的。印钞收益如鹰酱国的国债；行政手段带来的收益来源，如巨龙国的社保跨区余额无偿调剂。怕喝咖啡，就不展开了。

收益分配：

房价涨了，也大抵是按照你在某区位的房本数量分配的。

值得注意的是，资金盘一般涉及多层的资金分配结构。这在资金盘上下线之间认为造成了资金收益等级的金字塔。这使得在整个经济模型不成立的情况下，金字塔顶尖的人依然可以赚的盆满钵满。

当然，资金盘的收益分配也在日新月异，可玩性增强了。

拉新方式：

但凡资金盘都需要拉新，这是颠簸不破的真理。加分

还有更牛逼的办法，行政强制式拉新，比如巨龙国的社保、公积金。不展开、不展开了。

提现限制：

通过上面的收益承诺和项目包装这两个属性大家应该可以想到，资金盘的账面收益和资金情况是分离的。也就是说，只要大家都提现，资金盘就垮了。那怎么办呢？给资金盘标配一个提现限制吧。

常见的提现有手续限制，比如公积金提现需要提交买房的各种手续材料。，2P，：利普托肯 28%安全限制，比如某小交易所，以安全为由，说用户恶意操作市场不给提现。德西肯德

资金盘风险：

资金盘从来不是一马平川的，伴随着各种风险。比如很多中心化盘，能够直接动用用户的资金，能够直接捐卷跑路。还有很多盘很够通过多次关网重启来逃避对用户的收益承诺，比如3M互助就多次重启。

还有些去中心化盘，也有开发者埋的雷。大户能够发动去中心化网络攻击等。

资金盘可玩性：

如今呢，资金盘都会多多少少增加一点可玩性，如同赌场里安排几个兔女郎。设置一系列娱乐属性比如奖池、空投、火箭等等。这些就不展开了。

结语

赛弗看着牛排，接着说：离开矩阵回到现实生活9年了，我意识到无知是福。

幼年时，比特傻总觉得一切事物都要去伪存真。价值是真，资金盘只是幻象。长大后越发困惑。以前觉得是价值创造的事业，后来却发现包含了资金盘。以前觉得是资金盘，后来看却有一些价值。比特傻见过跨越几代人而不灭的资金盘，也见过含辛茹苦创造价值却旋即灰飞烟灭的公司。比特傻看到身边的女孩真是青春美好，无限喜乐。等到女孩韶华逝去，则毫无波澜。世间万物，有价值的、没有价值的都会衰退。衰退和价值破灭才是规律，永恒似乎是人间禁忌。

今天，比特傻告诉了你资金盘的基础认知和属性。限于篇幅，比特傻会在之后的篇幅里以更加深度和宽广的视角带你一起分析资金盘。放眼望去，社会生活的方方面面几乎都是资金盘。现代金融系统也被资金盘包裹着。然而社会教育和舆论从来只说创造价值，走一条艰辛的路；却从来不曾系统性地教导我们在大大小小的资金盘中生存。比特傻偏要说，看透资金盘，是现代人社会生存的必备技能之一。正心正念，这条路比特傻带你一起走。

title: Kampf zur Flucht
body:
Lohnt es sich? Lohnt es sich jeden Tag aufs neue, in der Mannier Sisyphuses, gegen den totalen amoralischen globalen Zeitgeist anzukämpfen? Tragen diese letzten Widerstandskämpfe überhaupt nennenswerte Früchte oder sind sie die letzten Atemzüge, die letzten Spasmen, eines mit dem, weltlichen Tode, ringenden Organismuses? Kurz gesagt ist es besser zu Kämpfen oder die Beine in die Hand zu nehmen und die Flucht nach vorwärts anzutreten, doch wie und wohin soll geflüchtet werden?

Mit dem Advent der Globalisierung, sowie dem endgültigen Sieg des Liberalismus, stellen sich nun einige vergleichsweise wenige Seelen, die Frage, wie sie diesem allesumschlingenden Levithian zu entkommen vermögen. Sich in Reih und Glied aufzustellen, die Kriegstrommeln zu schlagen und zu den Waffen zu greifen, mag zwar auf den ersten Blick heroisch wirken, doch bei genaurer Betrachtung, wird man bedauerlicherweise sehr schnell feststellen, dass es wenige, viel zu wenige Organisationen, Gruppen oder Indivdiuen gibt, die sich dem kontemporären Leitbild erfolgreich zur Wehr setzen könnten. Dies mag nun vielen von uns, dem liberalen Leitmotiv antipathisch, gegenüberstehnden, sauer aufstoßen und manch einen sogar, bei längerer Kontemplation, den Lebenssinn kosten, jedoch sollte diese, unsere Zeit, nicht als Kapitulations sondern als Äon der Neuformierung betrachtet werden. Seit geraumer Zeit nun pflegen es gewisse Gruppierungen, bei feindlicher Übernahme ihrer Heimat, in den Bergen Schutz zu suchen, umso der Annihilierung zu entgehen und sich von Neuem zu sammeln. Jene unnachgiebigen Individuen, setzen sich und davon bin ich überzeugt aus den elitärsten und vorzüglichsten Personen eines Volkes zusammen, ein Bund ideologisch,physich und psychisch abgehärteter, anti-nihilistischer langfristig zu denkend vermögender, Atlassen.

Nun ist es sicherliches kein Leichtes, sich über Jahre hinweg zwischen schroffen Gebirgswänden gefangen, dem überlegenen Gegner zu widersetzen, dabei nicht in eine Katz und Maus Spirale zu verfallen und sich für seine Rückkehr und all jenes was danach ansteht, vorzubereiten. Noch schwieriger ist es aber wenn man gar kein Regenwald, Gebirge oder sonstiges Rückzugsgebiet besitzt, selbst die Flucht wird zu einem Kampf, noch bevor die eigentliche Schlacht beginnt.

Doch es wäre ein gewaltiger Trugschluss, sich der Ohnmächtigkeit in die Arme zu werfen und jegliche Hoffnung zu verlieren. Solange auch nur ein Mitglied des Stammes überlebt, kann der Samen von Neuem eingepflanzt werden, dabei sollten wir nie aufhören außerhalb der konventiollenen “Box” zu denken, nicht nur der physische sondern auch der digitale Raum, vermögen es Rückzugsgebiet zu bieten.

title: FF Season One Recap, Introducing Off-Season and What's Next
body:
Seasons are about action. Forefront’s Season One was no exception.

Throughout the season, our community was in the weeds of dozens of projects, initiatives, and discoveries. Every day there were new people to meet, new challenges to overcome, and new boundaries to push forward.

In order to keep progressing efficiently towards our mission of becoming the **“Port of Entry to Web3”**, we need to reflect, recover, and recalibrate.

As Season One comes to a close, we’re calling on our community to take some time to explore what made their Forefront experience great, provide insight about where we can improve, and shape where we go from here.

First, let’s take some time to celebrate what we’ve accomplished.

## Season One Highlights

![Season One — Highlights](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vjsfewomFqroPlrJTi3cb.jpg?height=720&width=1280)

[Forefront Season One](https://ff.mirror.xyz/Fj6LKnH1FSwz5eFaHBNuvChhn1Z_nA82w7FthkOV8Hg) was titled Enter the Forge. Our goal was to begin to build the teams and structures necessary to grow Forefront into a DAO powerhouse. It is unbelievable to think about all we’ve achieved in the last three months.

### DAO Contributors

The Forefront DAO grew from just 5 core contributors in the Pre-Season to now 29 contributors spread across three Guilds. Our Culture Guild took the lead on building out a formal onboarding process, helping new members gain context, meet other contributors, and complete bounties as a pathway to becoming a contributor. In parallel, we build out a contributor rewards structure with base allocations, project rewards, and an end-of-season Coordinape pool.

In part thanks to the treasury diversification round, Forefront was also able to [onboard](https://snapshot.org/#/ffdao.eth/proposal/QmejUFkTFzhWS3McVpYbfX3C4u1cBLSFqqfqysvXe3rrL5) its first official Full- and Part-Time Core Contributors to the DAO who can be paid (partially) in USDC. These Contributors have each made long-term commitments to pushing forward high-level DAO initiatives and helping coordinate Guild activities.

The strides we’ve taken to empower and retain talent to put Forefront in an exciting position moving forward. While there is plenty to improve, we are extremely optimistic for what is to come.

### Projects & Initiatives

While the newsletter was one of Forefront’s core “products” heading into Season One, the team managed to ship at an insane rate throughout the last three months, dramatically expanding our reach and workload.

First, Forefront pushed the boundaries of DAO culture with our FF Birthday Celebration. This was a multi-day digital event with games, competitions, DJ sets, and so much more. Be on the lookout for [Forefront DAOlloween](https://metaverse.forefront.club/) coming this month.

From a content perspective, Season One saw the launch of some major new media pillars:

* [Forefront Learn,](https://forefront.market/learn) a comprehensive resource to go from zero to DAO contributor by learning about social tokens, DAOs, and more.
* [Forefront Podcast](https://forefront.market/newsletter), which includes high-quality recordings of our weekly FF Hangouts + weekly news wrap-ups of the crypto space at large.
* [Forefront Wrapped](https://forum.forefront.news/d/43-forefront-wrapped-5), our weekly DAO summary for contributors and lurkers alike to be able to stay up-to-date on all things happening in the Forefront DAO.

There are plenty more projects in the works, all with the mission of making Forefront the port of entry for web3.

Finally, Forefront had some in-person fun this Season as well! FF Contributors attended and [spoke at MCON](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=797dfjgF1wg), and we’ll be making some moves at LisCon as well.

### Treasury Diversification

The beginning of Season One kicked off Forefront’s [treasury diversification](https://ff.mirror.xyz/Yqo1j1RlCowOCRBnxupprIZ8w4RLRxit67x6pIK1hrA) round. A lot went into this process, including answering questions like who should we include in the round, how much should we raise, what should the terms be, and many more.

Eventually, with tons of community support, we landed on a $2.1M raise from dozens of strategic investors, angels, and community contributors. This addition to Forefront’s treasury will help us scale our effort, onboard full-time contributors, and continue to build at the cutting edge of DAOs.

The initial proposal was hosted on our Forum for community feedback. We then hosted 3 separate Hangouts in our Discord with many of the investors leading the round where community members could ask questions and submit ideas. Many changes were suggested, which we incorporated into the proposal. That final proposal was then voted on Snapshot before the process was kicked off. We’re proud to be able to involve so many community members in the process and in the round itself.

### Growth

![Season One — Snapshot](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WbWGOuDJXwrOJ5IcEKJE7.jpg?height=720&width=1280)

As our output has increased, so has our impact. During season one our core contributors grew from 5 to 29 people (a 480% increase), who collectively earned 68,971 $FF in return for their efforts.

Across the 13 events and hangouts we ran in Season One we saw thousands of attendees and a truly insane roster of featured guests including Kei Kreutler, Toby Shorin, Ameer “Sirsu”, Patrick Rivera, John Palmer and Jarrod Dicker.

Bigger and bigger ships are bringing people to the shores of web3 and to new projects within it, and we’re thrilled that the leaders who are truly pioneering the space are coming to Forefront’s port to help guide them forward.

## Introduction Off-Season

![Off-Season Goals](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8wFm1pIBwf-hYsZ8A8KbJ.jpg?height=720&width=1280)

### Off-Season Goals

While we’re more excited than ever about the future of Forefront, we can’t move forward blindly. Planning for Season Two and beyond must be an intentional, community-driven effort. As such, we’re kicking off an “Off-Season” period featuring community feedback opportunities, North Star sessions, Values Design, and much more. The goal is to ensure that everyone’s voice is heard in imagining the future of Forefront. Be on the lookout in the Discord, newsletter, and forum for meeting dates!

We’ve been running full speed ahead for the last 3 months – this next period is a time to slow down, reflect, and reimagine. We’ll still be working hard to produce and ship as a DAO, but with a renewed focus on the future.

We are gently building each other up by strengthening our bonds through trust and vulnerability. It is imperative for longevity and community health that we build these Off-Season periods into the fabric of Forefront.

### Off-Season Program:

1. Reflection gatherings on Community Feedback;
2. North Star workshop;
3. Governance workshop;
4. Season & Product roadmap workshop;
5. Team Building & Health sessions;
6. Party like it’s 1999;
7. More TBD via community Vibez.

Off-Season will officially starts October 28th and run for a period of about 5 weeks.

### Community Feedback

Please take a few minutes to complete our Community Feedback Form. 

This form is our first step in aggregating community feedback and insight to continue to grow and improve throughout the Off-Season and beyond. Regardless of whether you were a hardcore Season 1 Contributor or a lurker looking to get involved, definitely take some time to fill out the form!

[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScRFErRsBQ3rtb9volggxHG1fkS2FmZeTbU7Q1DcMiVPfS1aQ/viewform](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScRFErRsBQ3rtb9volggxHG1fkS2FmZeTbU7Q1DcMiVPfS1aQ/viewform)

## Season Two - Looking Ahead

While there’s plenty to think through during the Off-Season, the Forefront community has already been thinking hard about what the future might look like.

![Season Two — What's Next ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hIH7cQiezzoTsLfIn_ggJ.jpg?height=720&width=1280)

Some projects are already in the works across various Guilds. For example, we’re completely reimagining what Forefront’s DAO2DAO strategy looks like and how we can promote ecosystem-wide positive-sum games. We’re also working on product development (infrastructure for social token communities), public goods funding, new media experiments, and so much more.

## Forefront Foundations

Forefront has come a long way, and we’re extremely excited for the future as we continue to grow and evolve, together.

Now, more than ever, we’re calling on the larger web3 community to come join us in building a vibrant, positive, creative community. We are actively building the port of entry to web3, and we need everyone to do their part in achieving this goal.

If you’re interested in joining Season 2 reflection and planning sessions, have a project you’d like to work on with Forefront, or just want to join for the vibes, definitely stop by [our Discord](https://forefront.community)!

Forefront is shipping – we hope you’ll join us :)

*Thank you to our evolving community and to all active contributors who made Season One possible: Caroline Nguyen, Jihad Esmail, Joey DeBruin, CPTN Skeletor, Grendel, Makoto Inoue, David Tomu, Rafael, Chase Chapman, Gian Ferrer, Mel Shields, Austin Robey, Marvin Lin, Sat Panesar, Eliot, Richard Patey, Rafathebuilder, Bee Bradley, Alex (Aureus), Kevinc, Snorky, Jacob, Meral, Tolu, Vooka, Milan, Isiah, Qhawe, Natalie, Carlos Gomes, Andy Tom, Jenil Thakker, and Nir Kabessa.*

title: Cain&Abel, Narzissmus und Girards mimetische Theorie
body:
Cain und Abel, in den drei abrahamitischen Religionen, als die Söhne Adam und Ewas bekannt, liefern uns die orginelle  Blaupause des Homizids, eine perverse Dreickecks Symbyose, aus Neid, Arroganz und Narzissmus. Kaum ein Mensch, der die Geschichte der Geschwister kennt, wird behaupten, dass obwohl, Abel der von Gott bevorzugte Bruder war, es Cain schlecht erging, absolut gesehen hatte er genau die gleichen materiellen Wohlstände wie sein Bruder, aber relativ gesehen und das ist der springende Punkt, eben nicht. Cain, der wohl der erste Narzisst der Menscheitsgeschichte war, erachtete sich als besser, jemand dem mehr zu steht, knapp gesagt eine von Arroganz und Hybris geplagte Seele.

*“Der Ausdruck Narzissmus steht  im weitesten Sinne für die Selbstverliebtheit und Selbstbewunderung eines Menschen, der sich für wichtiger und wertvoller einschätzt, als urteilende Beobachter ihn charakterisieren.”* Nun werden einige Leute, sofern sie mit  Rene Girards mimetischer Theorie bekannt sind, bereits erahnen, welche Richtung dieser Artikel einschlagen wird , trotzdem möchte ich noch einmal einen Grundriss eben jener Theorie zügig paraphrisieren und dann ein Synoptikum zwischen Mord Narzissmus und Mimetik erstellen.

Laut Girard stehen wir Menschen in ständigem Konkurrenzdenken, dem aber nicht genug konkurrieren wir auch noch um die Sachen, die anderer Leute Begehren sind wobei Girard  hier noch einen Schritt weitergeht und gar behauptet, dass der Mensch an sich keine wirklichen Wünsche und Verlangen hat sondern diese immer von anderen Menschen geprägt sind, also ein chaotisches Wechselspiel der Bedürfnise. Wenn wir dieses Konzept nun in unsere heutige Zeit, ein Äon der Negierung höherer Macht/Gottes, verlagern, sehen wir ganz klar und deutlich eine Deifizierung des Menschen. Denn wer ist den nun unser Maßstab nach, welchem wir uns richten sobald wir keinen Gott und dessen Regel akzepitieren? Der Mensch wird selber zum Maßstab, wir messen uns ständig mit anderen Menschen und legen dermaßen viel Wert auf deren Meinung, dass wir sie zu Ersatzgöttern oder besser gesagt Götzen empor gehoben haben, die nun uns beeurteilen obwohl wir ebenso ihn Konkurrenz mit ihnen stehen, paradox nicht war.

Kommen wir nun also zur Verbindung dieser unheiligen Dreifaltigkeit im Lichte unserer Zeitepoche und warum dieser Trend wohl akkzelieren und sich fortsezten wird. Wie oben festgehalten beneidet Cain, Abel wegen eines Vergleiches, nicht mehr und nicht weniger, er vergleicht sich mit ihm, stellt fest dass er etwas anscheinend besseres besitze, ist voller Arroganz und entscheidet sich dafür Abel zu ermordern. Cains Narzissmus gepaart mit jenem Vergleichsdenken führte ihn schlussendlich dazu die wohl arroganteste Tat zu begehen und eine Menschenseele auszulöschen. Dieses Vergleichsdenken ist heute dank Social-Media omnipräsent, ebenso werden immer mehr und mehr narzisstische Charakterzüge an den Tag gelegt, generell sprechen manche Soziologen bereits von der narzistischsten Generation schlecht hin und was am Anfang der Menscheitsgeschichte zu Blutvergießen geführt hat, kann auch heute wieder dazu führen. Auch wenn so einige moderne Zeitgenossen uns gerne von dem lächerlichen Gedanken überzeugen wollen, dass der Mensch sich verändert hätte und wirklich den Rang eines Gottes einnimmt.

title: 以DAO的方式生活
body:
**什么是DAO？**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ryCXCJtiz42-WDkKrMgPB.jpg?height=608&width=1080)

DAO是去中心化自治组织（decentralized autonomous organization）的英文缩写。因为没有正式的领导，所以它是去中心化的；允许任何成员做出决定，所以它是自治的。你可以将DAO同公司类比，比如两者都是为了某项事业而把个人组织起来；通过创造价值解决社会问题；提供一个创造财富的机会（包括个人和整个社会）。

以DAO的方式将人们组织起来有很多的好处。它没有正式的角色或等级制度，它的决策是由社区意见决定的。DAO依靠的是自愿劳动。人们在DAO里提供价值，是因为他们自愿的选择，劳动力的质量成倍提高。总之DAO将更具效率，更强调目标理想使命而非利润。

                                                                            **为什么DAO？**

回到我想说的，随着疫情的影响、美联储的放水、强权的打压，BTC真正成为了一种价值存储。BTC开始进入特斯拉等上市公司资产负债表，成为萨尔瓦多法定货币，ETF获批。所有的一切都使得比特币的基本面愈发强大。

就像曹寅说的一样，凡是参与这场crypto大潮的人都是幸运者，在这，更是幸运者中的幸运者，看看你身边的nocoiner。所以，请不要辜负这一份幸运，珍惜并行使crypto赋予你的自由。对于我们，投资并不仅是ape和fomo，应该从更大时间尺度来考虑金钱、人生、家庭、理想之间的关系了，尤其是现在这个时候。

那么当我们不再有生存压力后，我们应该做什么呢？或许是时候以DAO的方式来看待我们的生活了，去追求理念的，形而上的东西。如此我们的使命便更具体，理想更清晰。

不论你承认与否，以DAO的方式来看，我们每个人正在做的事情都在使这个世界变得更好。无论所做的事大与小，重要与否。如同比特币一般，你的赞美或是谩骂，权力机构的打压或扶持，比特币始终是比特币，它只会变得更加强大。

                                                                      **以DAO的方式生活**

展望未来我想DAO会逐渐融入我们的生活，以目标为驱动的去中心化的治理方式，替代将利润放在第一位的传统公司制度。当我们以DAO的方式思考，我们的生活会变得更富有意。从忙碌的蜜蜂到写字楼前的人群，你可以看到DAO无处不在。

或许DAO将会在元宇宙中大放异彩，素未谋面的人将自发的协作起来，那时我们每个人都能致力于我们的理想，发挥出更大的价值。

参考文献：《DAO正在吞噬世界》，作者Michael Macaulay

### 什么是DAO

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/n6fED-B821K0xCEfbjbKW.jpg?height=608&width=1080)

DAO是去中心化自治组织（decentralized autonomous organization）的英文缩写。因为没有正式的领导，所以它是去中心化的；允许任何成员做出决定，所以它是自治的。你可以将DAO同公司类比，比如两者都是为了某项事业而把个人组织起来；通过创造价值解决社会问题；提供一个创造财富的机会（包括个人和整个社会）。

以DAO的方式将人们组织起来有很多的好处。它没有正式的角色或等级制度，它的决策是由社区意见决定的。DAO依靠的是自愿劳动。人们在DAO里提供价值，是因为他们自愿的选择，劳动力的质量成倍提高。总之DAO将更具效率，更强调目标理想使命而非利润。

### 为什么DAO

回到我想说的，随着疫情的影响、美联储的放水、强权的打压，BTC真正成为了一种价值存储。BTC开始进入特斯拉等上市公司资产负债表，成为萨尔瓦多法定货币，ETF获批。所有的一切都使得比特币的基本面愈发强大。

就像曹寅说的一样，凡是参与这场crypto大潮的人都是幸运者，在这，更是幸运者中的幸运者，看看你身边的nocoiner。所以，请不要辜负这一份幸运，珍惜并行使crypto赋予你的自由。对于我们，投资并不仅是ape和fomo，应该从更大时间尺度来考虑金钱、人生、家庭、理想之间的关系了，尤其是现在这个时候。

那么当我们不再有生存压力后，我们应该做什么呢？或许是时候以DAO的方式来看待我们的生活了，去追求理念的，形而上的东西。如此我们的使命便更具体，理想更清晰。

不论你承认与否，以DAO的方式来看，我们每个人正在做的事情都在使这个世界变得更好。无论所做的事大与小，重要与否。如同比特币一般，你的赞美或是谩骂，权力机构的打压或扶持，比特币始终是比特币，它只会变得更加强大。

### 以DAO的方式生活

展望未来我想DAO会逐渐融入我们的生活，以目标为驱动的去中心化的治理方式，替代将利润放在第一位的传统公司制度。当我们以DAO的方式思考，我们的生活会变得更富有意。从忙碌的蜜蜂到写字楼前的人群，你可以看到DAO无处不在。

或许DAO将会在元宇宙中大放异彩，素未谋面的人将自发的协作起来，那时我们每个人都能致力于我们的理想，发挥出更大的价值。 
 

参考文献：《DAO正在吞噬世界》，作者Michael Macaulay

title: A Guide to Effectively Cheating NFT Launches (and detecting cheaters)
body:
**Authors:** Maximino DiGiacomo-Castillo, Kun Peng, Ricardo Rosales, Nicolas A. Bax

At [Convex Labs](https://www.convexlabs.xyz/), we’re NFT fanatics. We believe that NFTs can revolutionize the art and collectibles spaces.

As described in Paradigm’s *[Guide to Designing Effective NFT Launches](https://www.paradigm.xyz/2021/10/a-guide-to-designing-effective-nft-launches/)*, NFT launches are often unfair to the average user. Hasu and Anish Agnihotri describe several pitfalls which can give sophisticated users an edge and allow such users to extract value from both creators and other collectors.

One common design error is what Hasu and Anish Agnihotri term “exploitable fairness”. Part of the fun for buyers of NFTs is the “[gacha game](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gacha_game)” aspect: buyers may get a common NFT, or if they’re lucky, they may get an NFT with rare traits, which can sell for several fold more than their common (“floor”) counterparts. To be fair, NFTs should be minted randomly. However, sophisticated users are constantly on the lookout for ways to increase their odds of minting or buying a rare NFT.

We have developed and deployed tools for the purpose of gaining an advantage when buying NFTs and we aren’t the only ones; we’ve observed others using such tools for months and recently numerous paid services such as traitsniper.com have appeared. Today, we’re open sourcing our tools, describing how we use them, and how we can detect when someone else has used similar methods to gain an advantage in an NFT launch.

Our cheating tools work by finding metadata before it is available to the average user, and then using it to acquire more rare NFTs during the minting process, or by buying unrevealed NFTs before the metadata is uploaded on OpenSea. Similar cheating can also be carried out by project insiders.

We detected a lot of cheating using methods similar to ours and some instances are described here. Our hope is that spreading awareness about such tactics will prompt the NFT community to demand provably fair NFT drops.

# How to use our tools to cheat at NFT launches

**Step 1. Acquire metadata**

First, you’ll need to find the token metadata for the collection you’re targeting. Check the token’s URI to see if it is pointing to an IPFS page or website with metadata. If it is, we’ve provided a script called *[pulling.py](https://github.com/Convex-Labs/honestnft-shenanigans/blob/master/metadata/pulling.py)* that takes the contract address as an input and then rapidly scrapes all of the metadata for an NFT collection.

![Our pulling script takes the ERC-721 contract address as an input and then rapidly scrapes the metadata.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JeZ2agPJwtvgn_i9RV_Y0.png?height=925&width=1400)

If you can find the metadata before the initial sale is complete, then you’re golden — just proceed to step 2 to identify which NFTs are worth minting, and then try to mint those.

We’ve observed many different mechanisms that projects use to hide their metadata. The most common is to hide the metadata until after an NFT launch is complete and then update the metadata on the project’s website. In other cases, the metadata is stored on IPFS and updated by changing the base token URI. We’ve had some success finding leaked metadata by querying OpenSea’s API or by scouring testnets and Arweave, where devs occasionally leak the IPFS hash for their metadata. Even if this method doesn’t yield metadata, it can provide other valuable insights.

![A sophisticated user describes the process they used to analyze an NFT project prior to its launch. (No metadata was leaked in this example.)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CVTx3sR3_jAJ6QFW9LJCR.png?height=750&width=591)

Sometimes we were unable to find the full metadata but were able to find leaking images. In this scenario, we just use a “for” loop to download all of the images, and then look through them manually for traits that we know are rare.

![A simple for loop can be used to scrape leaking NFT images before minting and/or reveal.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/32p47OJPa3xtA1tcKE9mn.png?height=389&width=490)

We have also observed instances where we were unable to find leaking metadata, but someone else was still able to gain an edge in minting. There are numerous possible explanations for this observation. One is that we were unable to find publicly leaked metadata whereas someone else was. An alternative explanation is that an insider possessed information — insiders may be directly related to a project, or they could be a 3rd party that is hosting the project’s metadata.

**Step 2. Calculate Rarity**

There is a strong correlation between NFT price and perceived “rarity.” The most widely used website for NFT rarity is rarity.tools, and they use the same algorithm to generate rarity ranks for almost every collection.

![Sale price as a function of rarity rank for the last 200 MekaVerse NFTs sold. (As of 10/20/2021)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/94oBL-tHIpAQvvngJ1HMd.png?height=718&width=1036)

Our *[rarity.py tool](https://github.com/Convex-Labs/honestnft-shenanigans/blob/master/metadata/rarity.py)* uses the metadata from step 1 as an input and then outputs the rarity score and rank for each NFT in a collection.

One thing to look out for is that the rarity score methodology does differ slightly; for some collections, rarity.tools uses “number of traits” as an attribute, but for others it doesn’t. Some collections also have custom rarity scores which will need to be scraped separately. Now that you have the rarity for every NFT in a collection, go on to step 3.

*Note: we dislike rarity.tools’ ranking methodology but that’s a subject for a different article.*

We noticed that early on during NFT summer, a lot of NFT minters/buyers that we think were anomalously lucky weren’t using calculated rarity scores. Instead, we believe that they were simply scraping the metadata and looking for NFTs with a single very rare trait, as opposed to combinations of somewhat rare traits which together made an NFT rare. As time progressed, we noticed that some of the buyers began calculating rarity scores as described here.

**Step 3. Minting or buying**

Now that you have rarity data for the entire collection, it’s time to buy. If the collection is still in the minting phase, then you can try to mint the NFTs that you know are rare. To do this, check Etherscan manually, or better yet, write a bot that gets the tokenID of the last NFT that was minted. When the next NFT to be minted is the one you want, just send your minting transaction. Depending on the rate at which minting is occurring, this can be done manually or you may need to use a bot to time your transaction just right.

Because most launches allow batch minting, you may need to mint multiple common NFTs in order to snag a rare one. In some cases, you may also find multiple rare NFTs that you can mint in the same transaction, particularly when the NFTs aren’t randomly distributed.

![This anomalously lucky user minted 5 BlazedCats. The 5th was rare and could be sold for a price that easily offset the cost of the other 4.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/apHe-1bcm4oDMPqVjOOrU.png?height=271&width=623)

Since you know you’ll profit off the rare NFT, you can sell the other ones at or even below what you paid to mint them.

There is also one well-described example where someone used a [smart contract](https://github.com/Anish-Agnihotri/blog-effective-nft-launches-data/blob/master/01-exploitable-fairness/meebits/exploit.sol), along with flashbots, to guarantee that they only minted rare NFTs.

**Step 4. Pre-reveal Sniping**

Even if the mint phase of an NFT launch is concluded, or you weren’t able to obtain leaked metadata, you can still gain an edge in the next phase of the NFT launch. Many projects reveal their metadata after minting has concluded. However, there is a delay between when metadata becomes available and when OpenSea has finished updating. During this period, you can rapidly run the scripts we provided to obtain metadata and rarity scores and buy any rare NFTs that people listed for sale prior to reveal.

# Detecting “Anomalously Lucky” NFT Buyers

Our tools can also be used to detect buyers that we call “anomalously lucky.” To do this, you’ll need rarity data for an NFT collection, as well as a list of NFTs minted by each buyer.

We’ve provided rarity data for some projects on [github](https://github.com/Convex-Labs/honestnft-shenanigans/tree/master/metadata/rarity_data) or you can use our tools to get rarity data for other projects.

Once you have rarity data, the next step is to collect minting data for a collection as shown in [find_minting_data.ipynb](https://github.com/Convex-Labs/honestnft-shenanigans/blob/master/fair_drop/find_minting_data.ipynb). This will give you a database of every NFT minted by each account, and its rarity rank.

Every collection is different and you may need to tweak which statistical tests you’re using but we’ve provided some basic tools and data to help you get started.

A good first start is to run a Kolmogorov–Smirnov (K-S) test on the minting database — we have an example of this in [ks_test.ipynb](https://github.com/Convex-Labs/honestnft-shenanigans/blob/master/fair_drop/ks_test.ipynb).

The “null hypothesis” that our [K-S test](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kolmogorov%E2%80%93Smirnov_test) is attempting to reject is that a user minted NFTs randomly. The K-S test checks whether the rarity rank of all NFTs minted by a user may arise from a uniform distribution. In certain cases, such as when NFTs weren’t randomly distributed or part of the collection was gifted instead of minted, the probabilities get more complicated and you may want to generate synthetic datasets which consist of the NFTs an account should have had a chance to buy.

![A histogram showing the rarity ranks of DogeX NFTs minted by an anomalously-lucky user (red), and an average user (blue).](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aJgKPq00vtAJfwAQCClil.png?height=441&width=829)

Our K-S test code will run through every account that minted multiple NFTs from a collection and outputs some data about the lucky accounts. Our code can also be modified to identify accounts which bought minted NFTs before the metadata reveal.

![Example output for the two luckiest accounts that minted DogeX NFTs.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uFEnIj5Ry6RFeMWqHHmRp.png?height=277&width=531)

![Blue dots represent each NFT in the DogeX collection. Black dots represent DogeX NFTs minted by an anomalously lucky account.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7IgHYqJ1wuozvfaK6mL9d.png?height=564&width=835)

Interpreting the output of these statistical tests is nuanced. A p-value of 1E-5 does not guarantee that an account was grifting — if looking across hundreds of thousands of accounts, we would expect to occasionally find people who are that lucky. *(A p-value of 1E-22 on the other hand…)*

We also took a close look at several instances where members of the NFT community alleged that an account had grifted, and found that the accounts being accused were just slightly lucky (1% or 0.1% chance of occurring, absent additional non-statistical or off-chain evidence).

The K-S test may also give low p-values if the NFT collection itself wasn’t truly random. Conversely, just because an account *doesn’t* have an anomalously low probability also doesn’t mean that an account *wasn’t* grifting. In fact, we are confident that most of the accounts *we* used would not be identifiable by any statistical test, and we definitely aren’t the only ones clever enough to remain undetected.

# More Shenanigans

We used our scripts to take a close look at many NFT drops. Most showed no signs of anomalies and probably were executed in a fair manner (although not provably so!) However, during the course of our research we observed several other types of anomalies.

**Non-random distribution of traits**

As alluded to by Hasu and Anish Agnihotri, we also observed many NFT collections that did not have a random distribution of rarities. In certain cases, this means that sophisticated buyers can increase their odds of minting a rare NFT, even if they can’t guarantee the exact number they will receive because minting is occurring quickly.

![Great Ape Society Bananas showed an unusual distribution of rarity ranks.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tzG-7Kq5c9of8yyoluhie.png?height=586&width=896)

![Quaks had non-random rarity distribution. As a result, most users who minted towards the end of the launch would appear to be anomalously lucky.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IemNtLC_ZTjHvCnDVwsC2.png?height=426&width=694)

**Non-Standard Minting Processes**

We observed numerous NFT launches where the minting process for rare NFTs was unusual and randomness was impossible to verify. For example, one project made unverifiable claims that users were randomly selected off-chain to receive the rarest NFTs in their collection. These NFTs had a significantly higher resale value than the remainder of the collection, which was minted “first come, first serve”.

![Some projects have a special minting process for rare NFTs.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kkGKn_h0-n1_icwOcZsqq.png?height=539&width=845)

![A Discord message from an NFT project leader which describes how they randomly selected accounts to airdrop the most valuable NFTs to, along with instructions for verifying that the airdrop was fair.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/v34BeuITm96BJNCSNK3KA.png?height=336&width=707)

We use a metric that we call the “first flip” metric to gauge how profitable minting and reselling is for a given collection. In this particular collection, about 50% of the total profit came from the NFTs that were distributed using the random selection process described in the Discord screenshot above. *Note:* *This metric can’t rule out wash trading.*

![Screenshot showing the profit from reselling 8 Bit Universe NFTs after mint by token ID. About half of the first flip profits came from token IDs 1–100, which were given out after minting concluded.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-_FU5upuJ5021eDC9_JYm.png?height=823&width=1277)

**Unverifiable Commits**

We observed several projects that claimed to be using a provably random [commitment scheme](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commitment_scheme) to select NFT metadata where we were unable to find the commitment prior to token minting, nor were we able to verify that the metadata was generated after minting had concluded.

Whenever a launch does not use a commitment-reveal scheme, it is impossible to rule out that project insiders are not changing metadata of NFTs they minted or bought on the post-secondary market.

# How Can We Level The Playing Field?

We want the NFT space to succeed but we think that the shenanigans we have observed are extracting value from most users which is detrimental to the long-term health of the ecosystem.

1. **Provable fairness:** Cryptographic schemes for provably fair NFT drops already exist and we have already seen some projects utilize them. We hope that by spreading awareness about information asymmetries in NFT metadata, consumers will demand provable fairness from projects they patronize. We would be happy to audit NFT launches with regards to randomness but ultimately we want consumers to learn about the magic of cryptography.
2. **Fair metadata reveals:** Rather than relying on third parties such as OpenSea and rarity.tools to provide users with NFT metadata, projects should make NFT metadata available themselves immediately after it is revealed, thus negating part of the edge from scripts such as our [pulling.py](http://pulling.py).
3. **Enough with the “first come, first serve” NFT launches:** As described in the Paradigm article, “first come, first serve” launches disadvantage the average user and revenue that could be going to artists and projects is instead going to miners. We didn’t go into it much in this article but we agree with Paradigm —please stop doing your launches that way!

# Join Us

What we’ve shown here is just the tip of the iceberg. We have plenty of ideas for other methods to identify cheaters and are eager to hear ideas from the community. If you’re interested in joining our mission to research suspicious activity, drop by our [Discord channel](https://discord.gg/ZZZNETQc4W). To incentivize contributors, we’re setting up a bounty fund which we’ve seeded with our profits from sniping NFTs with leaked metadata. If you just want to follow along, follow [HonestNFT](https://twitter.com/Honest_NFT) and [Convex Labs](https://twitter.com/convex_labs) on Twitter and check out our new project’s [website](https://www.honestnft.xyz/).

title: What is Mosh DAO?
body:
## Mosh DAO

This project is a fork of [nouns.wtf](https://nouns.wtf/), but aims to position itself as a cross-chain NFT experiment that spans 3 EVM networks.

## Mosh DAO's Mission

We believe in a multi chain future, where different chains co-exist to one another. We aim to be a first of its kind, cross-chain NFT project. Mosh aims to become a cross-chain symbol, bridging chains on different networks.

## Story

We like the nouns, when we first saw it this summer - it was such an innovative project. However, the price is too high and rather exclusive for ordinary folks like us. Also, due to its nature, it is practically impossible for ordinary folks like us to participate in the governance… We thought we could do better! We w

## Summary

MoshDAO will generate 1 NFT(="Mosh") per day, on 3 Different networks, starting with Ethereum($ETH), Arbitrum($ARB), and Polygon($MATIC).

### A. Daily auctions -  Each day on all networks

This will be auctioned on the official [app.mosh.lol](https://app.mosh.lol/) website.All proceeds go to the Mosh DAO treasury.(Details to be announced soon…)

### B. $MOSH Token Launch on Juicebox

MoshDAO's governance token, $MOSH Token will be launched on [Juicebox](https://juicebox.money). $MOSH will be used to provide liquidity to the Mosh DAO, but also used as an overall to the Mosh ecosystem. (Proposal, Voting, Community-only meetups, etc.)

### C. Mosh DAO governance

Mosh DAO consists of two forms of governance.

1. Mosh Treasury DAO
   Only the Mosh NFT holders have the rights to govern the treasury.
2. Mosh Governance DAOAll $MOSH Token holders have a right to influence the direction for the project, including derivatives and other spinoffs.

## **Main points**

* The mosh artwork is not public domain, but spin-offs will be encouraged on the Mosh Governance DAO.
* 1 mosh trustlessly auctioned every 24 hours forever, spanning 3 different networks.
* 100% of mosh auction proceeds are trustlessly sent to Mosh DAO treasury.
* Mosh treasury will be controlled by governance in the Mosh DAO.
* Founder of MoshDAO, 'Moshers' receives rewards in the form of Mosh NFT. (14.28% of supply for the first 5 years)

## **Daily Mosh Auctions**

We will generate one mosh, every day, forever on a multi-chain. All proceeds will directly go to the Mosh DAO Treasury. Every 7th Mosh will go directly to the "Moshers" founder's wallet. (for the first 5 years)

## **Mosh DAO**

Mosh DAO will be governed on [gov.mosh.lol](https://gov.mosh.lol), through [snapshot.org](http://snapshot.org) protocol.

## **Mosh Traits**

You can randomly see the generated mosh images on [art.mosh.lol](https://art.mosh.lol).

## **Moshers Rewards**

'Moshers' are the 3 founders that founded MoshDAO. Here are the Moshers:

[@shunkakinoki](https://twitter.com/shunkakinoki)：Developer

Responsible for entirety of the code.

> *He has spent my childhood years in Silicon Valley (Cupertino City) from 4 to 10 years old and have 3+ years of experience in AI/CV/DL, web development & and cloud infrastructure (especially DevOps). Loves open source and excited about the potential of startups & Web 3.0 towards the future of the world.*

Github: <https://github.com/shunkakinoki>
Website: <https://shunkakinoki.com>

[@littlemonastar](https://twitter.com/littlemonastar)：Designer

Responsible for entirety of the design of the Moshes.

> *She is a Silicon Valley-based artist/designer who loves learning new technology and has a passion to build a platform for mindfulness and self-care through intentional technology use. Has skills in 3D modeling, animation, character design, coding, and video editing.*

[@0xshugo](https://twitter.com/0xshugo)：Community-manager

Responsible for the community & distribution.

This project is a fork of [nouns.wtf](https://nouns.wtf/), but aims to position itself as a cross-chain NFT experiment that spans 3 EVM networks.

We believe in a multi chain future, where different chains co-exist to one another. We aim to be a first of its kind, cross-chain NFT project. Mosh aims to become a cross-chain symbol, bridging chains on different networks.

MoshDAO will generate 1 NFT(="Mosh") per day, on 3 Different networks, starting with Ethereum($ETH), Arbitrum($ARB), and Polygon($MATIC).

### A. Daily auctions -  Each day on all networks

This will be auctioned on the official [app.mosh.lol](https://app.mosh.lol/) website.All proceeds go to the Mosh DAO treasury.(Details to be announced soon…)

Mosh DAO consists of two forms of governance.

   Only the Mosh NFT holders have the rights to govern the treasury.
2. Mosh Governance DAOAll $MOSH Token holders have a right to influence the direction for the project, including derivatives and other spinoffs.

* 1 mosh trustlessly auctioned every 24 hours forever, spanning 3 different networks.
* 100% of mosh auction proceeds are trustlessly sent to Mosh DAO treasury.
* Mosh treasury will be controlled by governance in the Mosh DAO.
* Founder of MoshDAO, 'Moshers' receives rewards in the form of Mosh NFT. (14.28% of supply for the first 5 years)

We will generate one mosh, every day, forever on a multi-chain. All proceeds will directly go to the Mosh DAO Treasury. Every 7th Mosh will go directly to the "Moshers" founder's wallet. (for the first 5 years)

title: NFTX：NFT定价与指数基金平台
body:
NFT 指数基金以NFT合理定价为基础；NFT合理定价以NFT足够的流动性为基础。但须注意的是，不同类型的NFT只适用于不同的流动性协议**。影响**NFT的价格有内在和外在多维因素，其中外因对价格的影响有三个层次：干预价格、发现价格、获取定价权。

Unicly：本质上仍是通过【市场拍卖机制】进行NFT的价格发现。亮点是市场传播干预定价：权益与治理代币的广泛流通——快速提高绑定NFT的市场热度和市场曝光——帮助NFT进入更大的市场获得更高出价——更多投机和治理代币价格继续上升——进一步炒作NFT。尽管这一自我强化的循环会在流动性代币帮助NFT进入“有效市场”后发生扭转，该机制的确适合需要更多人参与和推广的，流动性较差、炒作价值高、价格高的NFT，比如稀缺的数字艺术品。

NFTX ：“同类池平均价”方法，弱化非同质代币之间的市场价格差值，从而增强流动性。这一类是通过【跨市场套利机制】进行价格发现，当流动性足够好可以获得定价权。对于价格相近，具有较大应用基础，需要保证交易前后完整性的NFT资产，适合用NFTX进行交易，比如游戏道具、头像等。

### 业务模型

NFTX是一个DAO拥有的，专注于为具有同等价值的 NFT 创建价格底线的平台协议，并且在此基础上发行同类NFT的指数基金的平台协议。

解决的行业问题：

• 需要大量的资本支出才能有获得高价 NFT 的机会，参与门槛太高

• 缺少流动性，资金效率

• 从而缺乏市场定价、难以估值，也无法成为抵押品，资金效率低

**【定价：分类别的NFT收藏品池】**

根据收藏品种类的不同，NFT 被分为了不同的收藏品池，任何人都可以把属于该收藏品类别的 NFT 锁进智能合约。

1、类别可以做很细致的定义，比如Kitty Gen 0 仅包含元数据为 Generation 0 的 Kitty。

2、vToken 是根据收藏品项目划分的。目前热度集中在头部项目。老牌的 NFT 项目如 CryptoPunks 和 AutoGlyph 的 vToken 市场表现最好。

举例：

1、铸造：用户可以将 1 个 CryptoPunk 锁进智能合约获得 1 枚 $PUNK（vtoken），这代表用户可以获得对应池子中任意1个cryptopunk。（V2功能引入了一个 Zap 合约，允许用户“Mint & Stake”不交铸币费（ 5%），即锁仓punk添加流动性至少48h，同时分流动性池的交易费；否则选择交5%的铸币费，得0.95vtoken，其中0.05的50%给流动性提供者）

2、添加流动性：vToken 是基于 ERC-20 标准的同质化代币，首次发行的 vToken 需要在其平台内置的 SushiSwap AMM 添加币对并注入流动性以进行交易。

3、赎回：vToken 的持有者可以支付 1 个 vToken 在对应的收藏品池中赎回一个随机的 NFT，也可以通过支付 1.05 个 vToken 购买一个池中指定的 NFT。

总结：NFTX 的模型设计使 NFT 持有者有意愿将稀有度更低的 NFT 放到收藏品池以获得兑换收藏品池中其他稀有度更高的 NFT 的机会，**最终收藏品池中留下的都是稀有度最低、价格最低的收藏品。**再透过其 1:1 的 vToken 兑换比率，市场最终可以得到该收藏品相对公允的地板价（Floor Price），**这个价格理论上甚至比 OpenSea 的在售最低价更有参考价值。在流动性充足和收藏品池深度足够的情况下，vToken 可以实现作为 NFT 收藏品地板价指数的功能。**

**【基金如何运作：D1和D2】**

NFTX 基金分为 D1 和 D2 两种：

• D1 是基础基金。其中的 ERC-20 代币与 NFT 抵押资产 1:1 铸造。例如， 用户有五个 NFTX 的基础 CryptoPunk 基金代币 (代币代码 :PUNK- BASIC)，就可以随时用这五个 PUNK-BASIC 代币兑换任意五个初级 CryptoPunk NFT。

• D2 是复合基金。D2 中的代币由 D1 中的基础基金代币组合而成。例如， D2 的 PUNK 基金可由五种不同 D1 CryptoPunk 组成 (PUNK-BASIC、 PUNK-FEMALE、PUNK-ZOMBIE、PUNK-ATTR-4, PUNK-ATTR-5)。D2 交易对在Balancer设立资金池。

**目前 D1 基金在 Balancer 开设了 ETH 交易对资金池：**

• PUNK-BASIC/ETH 

• PUNK-FEMALE/ETH 

• PUNK-ATTR-4/ETH 

• PUNK-ATTR-5/ETH

• PUNK-ZOMBIE/ETH

下一步，开设 **D2 PUNK 基金交易对，将五个 D1 基金融合为 D2 单独交易对资金池。** 届时会创建 Balancer **资金池代币** (Balancer pool token，简称 BPT) 代表 CryptoPunk **指数基金，**持有者获得所有五种 D1 基金所有权。

• PUNK-CORE里包含以上五种PUNK代币，其美金价值比例为1：1：1：1：1。赎回 PUNK 代币需要先解除 PUNK-CORE 封装，之后将 PUNK-CORE 退还给 Balancer 资金池销毁，就能获得对应的 D1 基金。后续在 NFTX 前端界面即可操作。  

**NFTX的目标受众是谁？**

NFTX 有三个主要目标受众：投资者、套利者和 NFT 流动性提供者。

·希望购买和/或出售底价 NFT 的投资者而设计的，而无需等待二级市场上的bid

·套利者，他们可以从 NFT 金库代币与其在二级市场上的基础抵押品的底价之间的价格变动中获利。套利者可以使用 nftx.org 上的产品直接与这些池进行交互。

· NFT 流动性提供商，他们可以通过向一个或多个 NFT 金库提供额外的流动性和/或库存来获利。流动性提供者可以使用[nftx.org](https://app.nftx.org/)上的产品来铸造额外的 NFT 保险库代币，然后可以作为流动性提供。

### 经济模型：筹资与代币经济

$NFTX 是 NFTX 协议的治理代币。代币持有者在[Aragon NFTX DAO](https://www.qubi8.com/)对社区提案投票有投票权。目前提案需要有 80% $NFTX 持有人投票通过方可执行。包括去定义铸造和目标赎回的比例。

**交易费用分配（暂未明确比例）：**

[NFTX V1](https://v1.nftx.org/)不收取任何费用。

[NFTX V2](https://app.nftx.org/)，保险柜创作者根据进出金库造币和赎回的NFT收取费用。V2 中有三个费用选项，并为所有 DAO 和新的保管库创建设置为以下默认值

1\. 5% 铸币费

2\. 0% 随机赎回费

3\. 5% 目标赎回费

这些费用作为奖励分配给金库的流动性提供者。任何向金库提供流动性的人都可以通过使用 **zap** 自动生成流动性来绕过minting fees（铸造费用）。

### 行业分析

**行业概况**

NFT作为非同质化代币，其定价一直是一个难点。通过剖析NFT的价值构成要素，能够帮助我们分辨不同NFT价格发现机制的偏重点；以及不同的NFT流动性协议，是如何通过影响这些要素，从而干预价格、发现价格甚至获取定价权的。

> **NFT 的功能价值=实用性+所有权历史+数字稀缺性+供求关系+未来价值+流动性溢价**

（1）实用性

NFT 的实用性价值取决于如何使用 NFT，它能够带来哪些效用；以及在不同应用/生态中使用 NFT 的能力（尽管互操作性的实现还不充分）。另一个增加 NFT 实用性价值的方法是与其他企业建立伙伴关系，为 NFT 持有者提供福利。

（2）所有权历史

所有权历史的价值取决于 NFT 发行人和以前所有者的身份。拥有历史价值高的 NFT 往往由知名艺术家或拥有强大品牌的公司创建或发行（IP和权威背书、社会资本）。

（3）数字稀缺性——只适用于顶流

稀缺性是收藏品品牌创造价值的倍增器。稀缺性有三个子标准：绝对稀缺性、相对稀缺性和可用性。稀缺是供求关系的一种特殊情况。实用性NFT的供求关系是最容易调节的。

（4）未来价值

在非同质化代币供应和投机行为驱动下，NFT 的价格走势逐渐变得以金融投资预期为导向。

（5）流动性溢价

流动性溢价 (Liquidity premium)是指将一项投资性资产转化成现金所需要的时间和成本。在较短的时间以接近市价的价格将资产转换成现金则称该资产有较高的流动性。鼓励用户增加交易频率，提高 NFT 的流动性，防止资产因为闲置时间太长而贬值。如游戏可以设计机制，促使玩家交换资产以保持在游戏中的竞争力，

**NFT的价格发现机制**

**1**、销售机制 

**2**、拍卖机制 

**3**、碎片化机制  ——流动性溢价

**其他价格发现机制**

**1**、价格计算 （根据历史数据及相关因子）

**2**、专家网络/同行预测预言机 upshot (根据专家估价加权平均)

**3**、衍生品的隐含定价 （以未来的现金流和估值逆推艺术品的价格）

**风险点：**只有类似 CryptoPunks，在大多数 NFT 收藏者眼里存在共识的 NFT 收藏品能够长期保值。市场上大多数 NFT 收藏品项目无法建立起共识，在市场遭遇打击时会很快变得一文不值。

Unicly这个协议的成功，我是这么理解的：通过捆绑碎片化、拍卖和投票一系列动作，影响了以上要素，形成了**positive feedback loops.**

### 行业周期

随着NFT的金融化，NFT的估值和定价机制非常重要。例如，paradigm的地板价永续合约也建立在nft指数的基础上。他们提出了【地板价】的概念，即市场愿意为从某项目中获得nft所支付的最高价格，在不提前知道将获得哪个NFT的前提下。**NFTX 的目标是为 NFT 建立可靠的，使其在以太坊上的DeFi中得到更广泛的应用。**

### 竞争分析

有两种方法可以将 NFT 碎片化：捆绑法/集合法；价格底线与指数化

**1、捆绑法/集合法（ Unicly 和 NIFTEX ）**

**优点：**

• 支持单个 NFT / 一组的碎片化

• 小投资者能够接触到多样化的高价位 NFTs

• 代币持有人可以拥有对原始资产的**治理权**，使得有效用的 NFTs 价值最大化，比如创收型 NFTs （游戏地块）

**缺点：**

• 很难赎回原始 NFT。几乎没有办法赎回单个 NFT，需要买断整个捆绑资产以释放相关资产

• 没有价格底线可以参考。每一个 NFTs 都必须被单独估值，才能得出整个捆绑资产的估值

**2、指数化（NFTX 和 NFT20 使用）**

**优点：**

• 通过多市场套利为 NFT系列资产创建了较为稳固的价格底线

• 易于赎回原始一整个NFT资产

**缺点：**

• 每个D1基金只接受相同系列的 NFT

• 在一定程度上，模糊了 NFT的价值差，导致每个池子最后留下这一系列中最便宜的NFT

**捆绑法/集合法（ Unicly ）**

捆绑法指的是创建接受不同 NFT 的基金，然后将该基金代币化，用户可以购买基金代币来接触原始 NFT集合 。本质上仍是通过【市场拍卖机制】进行NFT的价格发现。

如unicly：“打包再拆分”，生成一揽子nft的所有权和治理代 币。让nft拥有了更多的流动性曝光和生态场景，且裹挟了更多的参与者，让 uToken 持有者有动力推广该收藏，使 NFT 有机会获得更高出价。这一机制的特征，使得 unicly方法适合炒作价值高、价格比较高的资产；该机制适合需要更多人参与和推广，比如高价值艺术品。

事实也证明了这一点，通过观察这几个项目的 TVL（总锁定价值），我们可以得出一个很肯定的结论，捆绑法已经成功地吸引了更高的管理资产（AUM）。且 Unicly 仅上线3个月，其TVL 是最高的。Unicly 成功的一个原因是由其流动挖矿项目推动的，第二个个原因则是 uJENNY 的创建，这是第一个建立在 Unicly 上的去中心化自治组织（DAO）。uJenny 凭一己之力地贡献了 Unicly 近 40% 的 TVL。Jenny DAO 的目标是获得有价值的 NFT，从这个意义上来看，它类似于一个 NFT 收藏组合的指数基金。

**指数法（NFTX）**

NFTX D1：“同类池平均价”方法，弱化非同质代币之间的市场价格差值，从而增强流动性。这一类是通过【跨市场套利机制】进行价格发现，当流动性足够好可以获得定价权。

NFTX适合一系列中稀缺度相近，但具有较大数量基础和价值共识的资产。对NFT进行分层，消减相近稀缺度相近的NFT对价格差，建构每一类型的平均价。机制适合价格相差不大、需要保证完整性的资产。比如游戏道具、头像等。

NFTX D2:将不同系列的vtoken进行组合出售，设置为NFT指数基金，是基于地板价的整个系列的价格指示标，适合那些不愿意投资单独nft的投资者。

**总结：不同类型的NFT适合不同类型的流动性协议。**例如**，**对于炒作价值高的NFT（顶尖数字收藏品）适合用Unicly，可以看做是一个NFT指数基金。而对于价格相近，具有较大应用基础，需要保证交易前后完整性的NFT资产，适合用NFTX进行交易，比如游戏道具等。

title: What is a NFT? - DanteAC - Medium
body:
![Digital Evolution](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*FmA1ow4X7rVeCS9lBNhe_w.jpeg)

This is a question that many people are asking at the moment and the interest is just going to increase trough time. NFTs have arisen as a consequence of the technological development of mankind and involve questions about the present, the future and in that sense many of the answers are in the past, going back in history.

Even for those who already have to a greater or lesser extent some understanding of the term, it is likely that they will be faced with the difficult task of trying to explain in simple words something that we will see if it becomes a complex phenomenon with the ability to impact every area of human experience.

## Why Fungible?

![BTC/ETH](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*6kkAedTUE1Jw0rR4ANqAng.jpeg)

I will focus on summarizing what is a Non Fungible Token — NFT.

First of all it is necessary to take into account what “fungible” means, from a monetary point of view, it is the property that money has of, for example, being exchanged 1:1, i.e. $1 dollar for $1 dollar. The same is true of Bitcoin since of the 21 million Bitcoins that exist in total all are equally equivalent to each other.

Therefore, unlike cryptocurrencies, NFTs are Non-Fungible and this implies that each NFT represents a guarantee of unique digital property in the form of an encrypted token that is registered in the blockchain. What this means is that every tokenized asset or NFT is subject to a unique owner, associated to a personal wallet, which can be verified on the blockchain of the network [(Ethereum)](https://ethereum.org/en/) where the asset is hosted, secured by a digital contract.

## Verification of Authenticity and Certificate of Ownership

![Profesor Elon Rocket Factory (PERF) NFT #1373](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*y8druaUabydy2j0VrmayJw.jpeg)

This means that any existing asset in the physical world can now be tracked in a digital public record, for example: from real estate, artwork, artists merchandise, [music albums](https://www.nytimes.com/2021/10/20/arts/music/wu-tang-clan-once-upon-a-time-in-shaolin.html), donations. Everything that involves a transaction or exchange of either a good or a service can be verified by the network.

From the cultural aspect related to the arts or music, it represents the possibility of defeating the piracy of content, it also gives the possibility of verifying the authenticity of the creative work of any person as well as safeguarding their intellectual property.

In addition to the above, this also allows artists to manage their work independently without the need of third parties who are in charge of validating the artists as relevant or not, i.e. the big galleries and museums or the music companies that hold the monopoly of the content.

## NFT, Community and Decentralization

![Networking Communities](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*jCxJcrR2-GPuw-m9eybnAQ.jpeg)

The innovation lies in the possibility of verifying and certifying assets of human creation such as art, music or real estate and any exchange that occurs as a result of the interaction between two people, this implies a direct change in the way in which value is exchanged for creative activities and for everything that is useful to society.

On the other hand, NFTs also have the quality of functioning as an entry key or a way to identify each individual as a member of a community, which opens endless possibilities for the way in which present and future humans can organize themselves into groups and interact with each other.

Perhaps this will allow for new ways of governance where each individual can be verified and identified within each community through a digital token as an active member of that community. title: Why Wallets Excite Me Again
body:
My first stab at an Ethereum wallet was in 2014. I collaborated with [Gavin Wood](https://twitter.com/gavofyork) and [Alex Van Der Sande](https://twitter.com/avsa) to imagine what a dapp browser, dapp store, network monitor, and wallet might look like.

![https://dribbble.com/shots/2175361-Ethereum-App-Store](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5DKrLigAQeGKG8yg9BFEv.webp?height=600&width=800)

In 2017 I pivoted my little company, Balance, from fintech back to Ethereum when I watched $ETH increased 1000x in value. We focused on the wallet problem again and made huge progress.

Balance pushed out beautiful web interfaces, the WalletConnect standard, a proof-of-concept mobile app, and lots of new design patterns to the Ethereum community.

[https://twitter.com/Balance_io/status/1446518755496919042](https://twitter.com/Balance_io/status/1446518755496919042)

Almost 8 years later, I am still thinking about wallets—why?

### iOS Safari Extensions

This summer Apple announced something that totally changed the game for the mobile web: an open API for extending mobile Safari. The mobile web for iOS users is dominated by the default Safari browser that ships with every version of Apple’s mobile operating system.

![https://www.statista.com/statistics/272664/market-share-held-by-mobile-browsers-in-the-us/](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y_ucAY60odgLFOnmlAfl5.png?height=898&width=1438)

I had not realised how big of a deal this would be until I tried the 1Password Extension on iOS 15 inside Safari on my iPhone. 1Password went from being a sideshow app that I needed to bounce into to a system that was interwoven with the websites I was using.

[https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1442799302955319297](https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1442799302955319297)

The password entry API Apple created a few years ago was a reasonable solution but it was always fairly restrictive. The Safari Extensions API allowed the 1Password team to fully express themselves and ship something magical.

[https://twitter.com/faraaznishtar/status/1402322626052182018](https://twitter.com/faraaznishtar/status/1402322626052182018)

It instantly became clear to me that someone was going to build an Ethereum wallet that takes advantage of this new system. Of course, my brilliant friend Faraaz had figured it out the minute the API was announced months before.

[https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1443693612110254080](https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1443693612110254080)

I started mocking up a prototype and shared it on Twitter. The response from the community was absolutely fantastic. We got a bunch of people into a Quill Chat and started hacking away.

Within 2 weeks, [Dimitar Nestorov](https://twitter.com/dimitarnestorov) had hacked together a working prototype by forking MetaMask and putting it inside an Extension.

[https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1447445762153975820](https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1447445762153975820)

This totally de-risked the project. We know it can be done and now we need to do it well. That will take more time and resources which I am happy to invest.

MetaMask launched in 2016 as a Chrome Extension. It linked Ethereum to the desktop web through the browser. It changed everything.

5 years on, I believe wallets that launch with Safari Extensions will have the same impact. Ethereum is coming to the mobile web. We are going to weave together the phone and the protocol seamlessly.

### Premium Ethereum 

[https://twitter.com/joogz6/status/1385243304824954881](https://twitter.com/joogz6/status/1385243304824954881)

Gas costs are too high for regular people. There are lots of efforts to fix it from many amazing teams. They have delivered  blazing fast systems with lots of security, speed, and cost trade-offs. Wallets have not kept up. It is almost impossible to use Ethereum Layer 2’s and sidechains on your iPhone. We need to fix this *ASAP*. We need to interact with multiple protocols with ease.

[https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1448829539946094595](https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1448829539946094595)

### Multi-Protocol Products Need Multi-Protocol Wallets

I recently visited Launch House in LA and had the pleasure of meeting one of the founders of [Internet Camera](https://internet.camera/). He was using IPFS for storage (Arweave soon!), Ethereum Name Service for identity, and Polygon for smaller interactions. He is blending together multiple protocols to make a great product—it is amazing!

[https://twitter.com/InternetCamera/status/1401559706364047362](https://twitter.com/InternetCamera/status/1401559706364047362)

Today, wallets need to *switch* between networks. You have to manually add the details of the network and then opt into each one every single time. It is ridiculous. We need wallets that smoothly communicate with every Ethereum-secured and EVM-based protocol. You should be able to get the job done and the wallet can figure out the complexities on the backend. Just like you do when you interact with top quality web applications today.

[https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1447386023206346752](https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1447386023206346752)

Designing for the merge, a sharded base layer, optimistic roll-ups, side chains, zero knowledge systems, and all kinds of new protocol upgrades is going to be a monumental task. It cannot be done by a single company. It will have to be done by a community.

[https://twitter.com/Balance_io/status/1451217039213793286](https://twitter.com/Balance_io/status/1451217039213793286)

### Open Source Ethereum Wallets

Ethereum is an open source project to its core. Today, there is not a canonical open source client for iOS written in native code (Swift / Objective-C) for interacting with Ethereum with a normal wallet setup:

* **Gnosis Safe** has an amazing multi-sig system but it is not designed to create simple seed phrase wallets.
* **Trust Wallet** has become more focused on supporting the acquiring company, Binance, and all its priorities.
* **Metamask** and **Rainbow** are written in React Native.
* Argent and Coinbase Wallet are closed source.
* Zapper and Zerion will probably be closed source.

All of these teams have made a set of trade-offs based on their biases and incentives. I respect nearly all of them. Shipping secure wallets is *really* damn hard.

However, I still find myself wanting to tinker with a wallet tool that is truly open source and native to iOS. I want to explore and play. I cannot do that today and neither can curious developers.

[https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1442772031846580225](https://twitter.com/ricburton/status/1442772031846580225)

**Want to join us?**

![Quill is magical](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_GRx_v-ELtpn7SmlArzYY.png?height=600&width=1222)

You can join us on Quill, a beautiful chat app from a Stripe alumnus. Invite: [here](https://app.quill.chat/invite/8044475636632951887/3372854565702528682/4922874832628256481/?openlink).

title: What is a NFT? - DanteAC - Medium
body:
![Digital Evolution](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*FmA1ow4X7rVeCS9lBNhe_w.jpeg)

This is a question that many people are asking at the moment and the interest is just going to increase trough time. NFTs have arisen as a consequence of the technological development of mankind and involve questions about the present, the future and in that sense many of the answers are in the past, going back in history.

Even for those who already have to a greater or lesser extent some understanding of the term, it is likely that they will be faced with the difficult task of trying to explain in simple words something that we will see if it becomes a complex phenomenon with the ability to impact every area of human experience.

## Why Fungible?

![BTC/ETH](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*6kkAedTUE1Jw0rR4ANqAng.jpeg)

I will focus on summarizing what is a Non Fungible Token — NFT.

First of all it is necessary to take into account what “fungible” means, from a monetary point of view, it is the property that money has of, for example, being exchanged 1:1, i.e. $1 dollar for $1 dollar. The same is true of Bitcoin since of the 21 million Bitcoins that exist in total all are equally equivalent to each other.

Therefore, unlike cryptocurrencies, NFTs are Non-Fungible and this implies that each NFT represents a guarantee of unique digital property in the form of an encrypted token that is registered in the blockchain. What this means is that every tokenized asset or NFT is subject to a unique owner, associated to a personal wallet, which can be verified on the blockchain of the network [(Ethereum)](https://ethereum.org/en/) where the asset is hosted, secured by a digital contract.

## Verification of Authenticity and Certificate of Ownership

![Profesor Elon Rocket Factory (PERF) NFT #1373](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*y8druaUabydy2j0VrmayJw.jpeg)

This means that any existing asset in the physical world can now be tracked in a digital public record, for example: from real estate, artwork, artists merchandise, [music albums](https://www.nytimes.com/2021/10/20/arts/music/wu-tang-clan-once-upon-a-time-in-shaolin.html), donations. Everything that involves a transaction or exchange of either a good or a service can be verified by the network.

From the cultural aspect related to the arts or music, it represents the possibility of defeating the piracy of content, it also gives the possibility of verifying the authenticity of the creative work of any person as well as safeguarding their intellectual property.

In addition to the above, this also allows artists to manage their work independently without the need of third parties who are in charge of validating the artists as relevant or not, i.e. the big galleries and museums or the music companies that hold the monopoly of the content.

## NFT, Community and Decentralization

![Networking Communities](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*jCxJcrR2-GPuw-m9eybnAQ.jpeg)

The innovation lies in the possibility of verifying and certifying assets of human creation such as art, music or real estate and any exchange that occurs as a result of the interaction between two people, this implies a direct change in the way in which value is exchanged for creative activities and for everything that is useful to society.

On the other hand, NFTs also have the quality of functioning as an entry key or a way to identify each individual as a member of a community, which opens endless possibilities for the way in which present and future humans can organize themselves into groups and interact with each other.

Perhaps this will allow for new ways of governance where each individual can be verified and identified within each community through a digital token as an active member of that community. This can be translated into new voting systems and therefore greater decentralization since each NFT within an ecosystem could be equivalent to a vote within a [decentralized organization](https://101blockchains.com/define-dao-decentralized-autonomous-organizations/).

## Mainstream NFTs
