title: STARS Token Distribution
body:
Stargaze is one of the first NFT markets to launch in the Cosmos ecosystem. Cosmos is a network of custom interoperable blockchains. It is currently the second largest ecosystem by volume, and includes Terra, Cosmos Hub, Thorchain, and Osmosis.

Stargaze aims to be a decentralized NFT market, totally owned and governed by its users. Therefore, distribution of STARS has to be equitable, accessible, and cover a large surface area.

## Token Release Schedule

A fair initial distribution is pivotal in setting the future direction of a network. Paired with a thoughtful inflationary release schedule, a network can optimize its token distribution.

The distribution of STARS is designed to front-load inflation in order to bootstrap the network. This is a similar issuance schedule to Bitcoin. However, instead of halvings, issuance will be cut by 1/3 each year (by multiplying the current issuance by a reduction factor of 2/3). Osmosis was the first protocol to use a [“thirding” token release schedule](https://medium.com/osmosis/osmo-token-distribution-ae27ea2bb4db) and heavily inspired Stargaze’s design.

For some background on using token incentives to bootstrap new networks, check out this great [tweet thread](https://twitter.com/cdixon/status/1440026947036356619?s=20) by Chris Dixon.

!["Thirding" release schedule](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TwRgLvwwmYuxQ8c4BqR3f.png?height=768&width=1024)

Stargaze will start with an initial supply of 1 billion STARS. An additional 1 billion STARS will be issued the first year. With this "thirding" schedule, the issuance for the following year will be 667M STARS. This leads to an **asymptotic max supply of 4 billion STARS**.

![Total supply formula](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4zhWsUYN9KbC12rOFyAZM.png?height=126&width=1284)

![Issuance calculations](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ooIF-U44MYirt21oEg4LL.png?height=1542&width=1630)

Stargaze starts off decentralized on day one with a genesis supply that distributes the majority of the tokens to community members. The Foundation will hold a strategic reserve of tokens, and will drive adoption of the protocol by delegating to validators, onboarding creators, and providing grants for ecosystem development.

![Community-focused genesis supply](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZTtjhTqZNqm1rNESQq8j2.png?height=768&width=1024)

After 5 years, the initial distribution is only 27.6% of the entire token supply. This issuance schedule allows Stargaze to grow and adapt its ownership to new creators, curators, validators, delegators, and other stakeholders.

![Genesis supply vs. new issuance after 5 years](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k_VH9Rk86klZ7IXo2ZbKC.png?height=768&width=1024)

Tokens for seed investors, validators, founders, and advisors are locked up for 1 year, and linearly vest after that for another 6 months - 1 year. This helps align values with the the development team and early stakeholders.

## Airdrop

The goal of the Stargaze airdrop is to reach the most active participants in the Cosmos ecosystem. Stakers and liquidity providers are more likely to be more active than just token holders. Therefore, Stargaze is doing its airdrop to a mix of network participants:

* **ATOM stakers**
* **OSMO stakers or liquidity providers**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Cosmos Hub**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Osmosis**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Regen Network**

For each role above, you will be able to claim **2,453 STARS**. Distributing a fixed amount is in the spirit of the original Uniswap airdrop, giving every user more or less an equal starting point. In order to claim your airdrop, you have to perform 4-5 actions on Stargaze when it launches. If you have used [Osmosis](http://osmosis.zone/) or [Rabbithole](https://rabbithole.gg/), you’re already familiar with performing tasks to claim tokens. Some claimable actions include bidding on NFTs, staking, and voting in governance.

Some minimums were put in place to prevent dust accounts and those attempting to game airdrops:

* **ATOM staker: 5 ATOM minimum staked**
* **OSMO staker: 50 OSMO minimum staked**

Furthermore, delegations to centralized exchange validators were excluded.

For example, if you’re an ATOM staker and OSMO LP, and meet the above minimums, then your airdrop reward is 4,906 STARS.

Osmosis liquidity providers get the airdrop regardless if LP tokens are bonded or not.

Airdrop claimable amounts start decaying 4 months after the launch of the NFT market. The decaying process linearly decreases the claimable amount for another 4 months.

![Airdrop must be claimed to prevent decay](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3_QgqhG1LETOtyBdL0a7P.png?height=768&width=1024)

After the airdrop claim period, unclaimed STARS are sent to the Community Pool.

Snapshots were taken on Oct 11th, 2021 from Cosmos Hub, Osmosis, and Regen Network.

To see how much STARS you’re eligible to claim, please visit <https://stargaze.zone/airdrop>.

***Note: Airdrops won’t be claimable until after Phase 3 of launch. Please see Phase 3 below.***

http://stargaze.zone/airdrop

## Reward Distribution

New token reward distribution will be optimized to facilitate the operations of the NFT market.

The initial breakdown per block will be:

![Per block distribution](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UzjJ1v4qZ-bF5zw1BY9kr.png?height=768&width=1024)

All chain parameters can be changed via governance vote. Everything suggested in this post are sensible defaults. We expect governance to adapt and change the protocol as it matures.

### NFT Incentives

45% of block rewards are set aside for NFT bidding and staking incentives. Token holders will be able to earn yield by bidding and staking on NFTs for certain periods of time. An upcoming post will outline this mechanic in detail.

If governance determines that NFT incentives are too high for achieving the desired effect of the protocol, they may direct these incentives towards the Community Pool where they can be spent later.

### Staking Rewards

As per the course with proof-of-stake networks, validators (node operators) earn rewards for securing the network. They also accept delegations from token holders, and charge a commission of 5% or greater for providing the service.

Nearly 100 validators were selected to join mainnet after 3 testnets, 2 of which were incentivized. They will earn 35% of all block rewards.

### Developer Rewards

Initially, 15% of block rewards will go to fund the team that contributes to the development of Stargaze. Each account gets a specific weight set by governance. When a developer is no longer contributing, governance can choose to modify their weight or remove their allocation.

### Community Pool

The Community Pool is the main DAO that operates the network. It is responsible for voting on parameter changes, software upgrades, community matters, and more. It will receive 5% of all block rewards.

## Phased Launch

Since Stargaze is a layer 1 blockchain with many moving parts, it will launch in phases.

* **Phase 0: Chain launch with 0% inflation (Oct 29th)**
* **Phase 1: Liquidity pools on [Osmosis](http://osmosis.zone/) and [Gravity DEX](https://cosmos.network/gravity-dex/)**
* **Phase 2: Governance proposal to enable inflation**
* **Phase 3: Web app launch with first NFT drop**

More details about the liquidity pools will be forthcoming. Please follow us on social media (links below) for updates. They are planned for 2-3 weeks after Phase 0, and have to go through governance to be funded via the Community Pool.

New tokens won’t be issued until after Phase 2, when inflation kicks in. At this time you’ll be able to stake STARS at [stargaze.zone](http://stargaze.zone/) via [Keplr Wallet](http://keplr.app/).

Phase 3 is expected to be completed before the end of the year. Airdrops will be claimable starting in this phase.

## Follow Us

To follow along with Stargaze developments, check us out on Twitter at <https://twitter.com/StargazeZone>, and join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE).

https://twitter.com/StargazeZone

[https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE](https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE)

Happy Stargazing ✨🔭

title: "Why does Metaverse grow?" thinking from the VR market
body:
## Introduction

Many people may think that the VR boom is over. **In fact, VR startups, especially in the US, are booming again.**

The number of VR devices shipped worldwide is expected to be approximately 18 million units in 2020 and approximately 28 million units in 2021. (Source: [CCS Insight](https://www.ccsinsight.com/press/company-news/3226-virtual-reality-and-augmented-reality-device-sales-to-hit-119-billion-and-99-million-devices-in-2021/))

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6v3rxdWyHhG3SsU_YlxxZ.png?height=304&width=645)

The VR device-related market is estimated to be about 7.8 billion dollars worldwide in 2020, and the CAGR (annual average growth rate) is estimated to be 28.2% from 2021 to 2028, and **VR is finally on the rise**. It seems that it has entered the growing season. (Source: [GRAND VIEW RESEARCH](https://www.grandviewresearch.com/industry-analysis/virtual-reality-vr-headset-market))

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fyyPcB_oZzW45nSbh3Ol1.png?height=314&width=606)

Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg said in July 2021 that he would "**make Facebook a metaverse company**."

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y1iOJj4be0Z9evSIY39Eu.png?height=578&width=800)

As you know, it was in March 2014 that Facebook acquired "Oculus", which was a representative of VR startups at that time, for 2 billion dollars. The data for 2020 is said to have been greatly influenced by "Oculus Quest 2", but it shows that **Oculus still has the top share and continues to be the center of VR** (in this article, we will analyze and consider the VR market with a focus on Oculus).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qNo20-r__n_o3pr2awrGT.png?height=514&width=560)

Seven years have passed since then, and **it can be said that the VR market has returned with the buzzword "metaverse," which means "meta (transcendent) and universe (world)**."

**Without an analysis of the VR market, the essence of the Metaverse cannot be understood.** So, this time, I would like to summarize in a note the path leading to "Metaverse" based on what is happening in VR now.

## Exciting "VR Startup" Financing

**Below is** **a table summarizing** "**final round funding only**" to see the most recent activity of funding for major VR startups since 2019.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e9bvQ6smCGvlu88ngo0a3.png?height=729&width=1105)

In the US, the leading social VR "**Rec Room**" has succeeded in large-scale procurement of $100M, and "**VRChat**" has succeeded in large-scale procurement of $80M. In addition, entertainment-related VR startups such as "**Sandbox VR**", which develops VR games and entertainment facilities, and "**Wave**", which develops VR live performances such as music, stand out.

## Is "VR not profitable" true?

In the past, people in the startup area were whispering that "VR is not profitable", but is that true?

The official Oculus blog (as of February 2021) has some very interesting data. There were **69 apps with sales of $ 1M or more and 6 apps with sales of $ 10M or more**. The company is (daringly) comparing gray as of September 2020 and purple as of February 2021, just five months later.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JotJvDDcdRRWe5ZUacWDU.png?height=451&width=800)

The VR rhythm game "**Beat Saber**" has become a title with sales of over $10M in about a year and a half since its release, that is, **at a pace of $5-7M**.

The VR battle royale game "**POPULATION: ONE**" has achieved $10M in a few months since its launch, and if it is 3 months, **it is earning $20-40M annually**. You can see that (\* Since there is an additional charge, it is calculated in the low range of the initial charge weight).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k3AJjzC9vdy8F-1i-Q0r_.jpeg?height=369&width=800)

I think it's difficult to understand if you don't watch the VR market all the time, but you can see that the perception that **"VR is not profitable" is becoming misunderstood**, especially in the US.

So where can we get a hint of "the way to the Metaverse" from the analysis of the VR market? In fact, **you can see that the ranking of VR apps is really suggestive**.

## Read "VR App Ranking"

Oculus has two rankings, "Top Selling" and "Most Popular". In fact, **there is a difference between high-selling apps and downloaded apps** (the "ranking" is as of August 1, 2021). Let's take a closer look.

## Oculus Quest "Top Selling"

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/noX4XBKblSaCmQsy05gl5.png?height=294&width=800)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BcshGUMuVVndkQPB06IVy.png?height=878&width=1102)

It's easy to see that **there are many VR games that were released in 2019 accounting for half**. Many VR apps are paid apps regardless of genre, and it is presumed that new users will be ranked at the top of sales as they are by purchasing standard apps (\* The above is probably a ranking that does not include additional charges).

On the other hand, three games released in 2021 are also ranked in, and you can see that new VR games are born and widely accepted by users.

By the way, **only 5 are ranked in the "Sales Ranking" and "Download Ranking" in duplicate. Why?** Let's take a look at the "Download Ranking" to solve your doubts.

## Oculus Quest "Most Popular"

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9NLgkBWdDoXhzqH12aeP0.png?height=290&width=800)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vBw371A-oRUfdHpZ8ZKtA.png?height=877&width=1103)

The "Download Ranking" can be broadly classified into the following three categories.

> **(1) Games**: Games that incorporate VR-like movements such as waving their arms and looking around 360 degrees, such as the VR rhythm game "Beat Saber" and the VR shooting game "Onward" mentioned above, are popular.

> **(2) Communication**: Social VR apps that enjoy communication in virtual space, such as "Rec Room" and "VR Chat", which are raising large amounts of funds, are popular.

> **(3) Utilities and other entertainment apps**: The only VR app other than games that was ranked in both DL and sales was the app "Virtual Desktop" for operating the desktop environment in the VR space. Although not in the ranking, photo and video viewer apps also fall into this category. In addition, "YouTube VR" is ranked as an entertainment application other than games.

Among these, I would like to pay attention to "**(2) Communication**" which keeps the top number of downloads in recent years.

## **Bored in virtual world experience**

Social VR, such as 2nd place "Rec Room" and 4th place "VR Chat", is becoming a new trend.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FZxo84pxC0glr_AgY0eJp.png?height=224&width=800)

Both have characters on the platform and enjoy walking around the world and communicating with their friends. You don't have to be a real-world friend. It can be said that the social desire to "talk to someone" and "want to interact" is generating the number of downloads.

The location of "where to meet" is also important. There is a space called a room in "Rec Room" and a space called a world in "VRChat", and the implementation method depends on the platform, but developers and creators can create their own space.

There are spaces such as the streets of New York and Japanese gardens that have transformed the real world into virtual spaces, and there are spaces that cannot be experienced in the real world, such as the scenery of anime. It can be said that such an extraordinary space excites communication.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=av8s5Gvg6iM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=av8s5Gvg6iM)

A virtual space experience is very important. But what if that continues forever? Whether it's New York, Tokyo, Egypt, or anime space, the moment when it changes from "unusual to everyday" will surely come. In other words, static content is "sick".

So how will social VR evolve?

The hint is the popular game "Fortnite" of the US Epic Games, which provides the game engine "Unreal Engine" that is also very active in VR application production.

## **Charge for communication, not games**

Fortnite is a representative game of battle royale games along with "PUBG" and "KNIVES OUT". Compete to survive to the end in a specific stage.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xF_H0g4cEnAHhwiJK1nq0.png?height=396&width=800)

Of course, the goal is to win, but that's not the only goal, and you can log in at the same time as your fellow gamers to form a team and play cooperatively while talking.

When you are playing with your friends, it is close to "**Communication > Game**", and other players appear while you are talking to your friends, so it feels like you are shooting (defeating).

It's free to play, and the billing element is to decorate your avatar such as "skins", not because it makes it easier to defeat your enemies, but **because you enjoy communicating with your friends more**.

Try on hairstyles that are embarrassing and impossible in the real world, try on flashy clothes and costumes of popular characters, and equip weapons with your favorite patterns. Just like your friends will notice you when you wear new clothes, compliment you when you change your hairstyle, and sometimes you'll be ridiculed if you have a wacky bag.

"Emotes (dance)" is the best way to share the joy of winning with your friends.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQhprWbyQD8&t=654s](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQhprWbyQD8&t=654s)

For such communication, we play the game and charge for it.

In freemium-type games, the purpose of additional charges varies from game to game. They can be broadly classified into **two types**.

> **Efficiency type**: A kind of "time saving type" item that you have to wait for a certain period of time to challenge the next stage, and you can challenge immediately if you purchase a recovery item. Includes items (weapons, cards, etc.) to make you stronger. There are also many gachas.

> **Avatar**: Customize the avatar with characters, item skins, etc.

In Fortnite, you cannot buy weapons to make it easier to clear the game. Even so, **it is said that many users make about $5 billion in sales by charging avatars to express themselves** (including non-skin charges).

## "Why do games and communication merge?" Three reasons

In the history of smartphone games, when the App Store first appeared, buy-out games were the mainstream, but after that, freemium-type games became the top sellers.

In that sense, I think it was only natural that free-to-play games like "Fortnite" became popular all over the world. If you think so, **VR should change in the order of "free download → billing"**.

Thinking this way, **there are some interesting changes in two apps: VR games and social VR**. In other words, VR games that are sold out will move toward additional billing through "communication," while free social VR will move toward "games" to incorporate billing factors.

In other words, **I think that the fusion of games and communication will accelerate even in VR**. In conclusion, I would like to summarize the reasons for the following three.

**(1) There are precedent cases of rapidly growing "games" in the world**

"Fortnite" isn't the only case where people were supposed to get together to play a game, but before they knew it, they got together to communicate. The same thing is happening with the popular US game platform "Roblox", which was listed in March 2021.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RTX6x4rQCfl3t_Im7lmaR.jpeg?height=250&width=512)

Most of the fastest-growing games in the world have an element of "communication". We believe that this trend will accelerate in the VR market in the future.

**(2) Communication requires topics**

It is actually a high hurdle to keep communicating synchronously all the time. **Appropriate “topics (contents and services)" are required there**. The most powerful content is "games".

Of course, depending on the person, it may be "music," "video," "art," etc., but history proves that "games" are still the most profitable.

**(3) Increasing needs for synchronous communication**

I think that many people feel that conversations (especially synchronous communication) have decreased due to the increase in telework from 2020 due to the corona situation. In the questionnaire, 70.9% of respondents answered that "conversation" and "chat" were "significantly reduced" and "decreased" in telework compared to when they arrived at the office.

**VR is a device with strong synchronization, and we believe that needs will increase in a world where synchronous communication has decreased**.

## Finally

We believe that "Game x Communication" will grow significantly in the VR market as well. This is the future of digital entertainment, and there is no doubt that there is a "metaverse" beyond that. The definition of the metaverse varies from person to person, but it is certain that one of the important contents in the space is "game".

However, looking at the trend of social VR, I felt that "games" are not indispensable, and that "communication" is the most important. I think that all kinds of content such as "games," "shopping," "media," and "business" will be integrated there.

People use the Metaverse to communicate.

Comic, animation, drama, movies, games, and any entertainment content that you can enjoy solo will end there, and content centered on communication elements and services will shine in the Metaverse era.

So what is the role of VR in the Metaverse?

Swinging a sword, throwing something in your hand ... One of the features is operability that you can't experience with a smartphone. But **the most important essence is that there is "immersive"**. Vision overlooking 360 degrees, 3D avatars that can be someone else, virtual experiences that cannot be achieved in the real world.

**VR with such an experience will be the best device and content to enjoy communication in the Metaverse era**.

We will continue to disseminate information centered on Entertainment Tech, so if you are interested in this article, please follow me on Twitter.

[https://twitter.com/yujikumagai](https://twitter.com/yujikumagai)

See you next time!

## Self-Introduction

**Yuji Kumagai**  
 Crypto Investment Manager at Akatsuki

**About Akatsuki Inc.**
A Japanese digital entertainment company, went public in 2016. Mainly develops mobile games and IP businesses, including comics and anime. Our mobile games with Japanese popular IPs got the top sale on US and a lot of European App Stores. Invested in 100 startups around US, India, Japan.

title: 欢迎来到树屋—Fancy Birds
body:
![第一章](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7i8WW4RfegkUjLlFkTVct.png?height=437&width=875)

### 第1章

欢迎所有的Fancy birds来到树屋!对我们来说，这是过山车般的一周。自从Pre-seed轮融资的消息在Cointelegraph上公布以来，The Discord一直在快速增长。我们非常感谢OGs和Early Birds，在我们专注于扩展DAO的同时，他们帮助保持了Treehouse的有序。首先让我们谈谈我们是如何走到这一步的……

## 起源

Fancy Birds是核心DAO贡献者**Mr. Fancy**的创意，正如你们中的一些人在Discord中所知道的那样。**Mr. Fancy**是一名长期的竞技玩家，有组织电子竞技比赛的背景，是加拿大的顶级玩家，并在过去两年参与了区块链领域。Fancy Birds 的想法是在观察到许多基于 PFP 的简单 NFT 项目无法兑现完整游戏的承诺后产生的。他还观察到许多已经被证实的游戏循环可以更好地用作P2E和PVP元素。 Fancy先生立即开始与两个DAO贡献者**Fancy-janitor**和**Mad-Badger**合作，组成一个DAO团队，能够完成他们一直以来最喜欢的游戏主循环之一——Fancy Birds就这样形成了。该团队不知疲倦地完成了项目的NFT部分，并在Rinkeby测试环境下完成了完整的第一版游戏。与此同时，该团队开始在Discord和Twitter上分享他们的一些预告片。 接下来发生的事让每个人都大吃一惊。

Illuvium 的联合创始人 Kieran Warwick 在推特上发表了关于 P2E Flappy Bird 的想法。

![P2E Flappy bird 在哪儿？](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A0pZzYRpM0TjQ5LEu-mmF.png?height=896&width=875)

在有机会最终向 Illuvium 联合创始人演示工作游戏并解释Fancy Games在v1版本之后的扩展路线图后，Kieran 立即担任战略顾问。接下来是数周的电话和演示，第一轮种子轮已完成。

这轮融资的主要投资者包括**Synthetix的Kain Warwick、天使投资人Santiago Santos(前parafi)、Sushi的0xMaki、1inch的Anton Bukov、Ankr的Ryan Fang、Aave的Stani Kulechov、Barnbridge的Tyler Ward、Quantstamp的Richard Ma、Fei Protocol的Joey Santoro以及Tokemak团队**。

Fancy Games DAO被这个项目的兴趣所震撼，并很荣幸有这样一个明星云集的区块链创始人开始这段旅程!

## 接下来会发生什么

### $FNC 代币

本周 Fancy Team 的目标是带来领先的种子轮 VC 以及完全关闭最后一轮种子轮。 完成后，我们将与社区分享，以最终确定公开发售的日期，然后是 Fancy Birds Genesis mint的正式日期。

截至目前，预种子轮占总供应的2.5%。种子轮将包括另外7.5%的供应，然后是另外10%的公共轮。剩下的代币百分比包括10%的理事会管理国库，10%的团队，20%的流动性奖励和40%的游戏奖励。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Q2FEjTudd4c5ILZ4xtWVw.png?height=1000&width=1000)

$FNC将既是治理代币，也是P2E代币经济的支柱。在专门的“树屋日记”章节中，我们将对代币经济进行更详细的分析。

### Genesis NFTs的白名单

总共将有**8888**只创世Fancy birds。创世纪系列的需求非常高，这是可以理解的。

Genesis Fancy Birds 将是唯一具有繁殖能力的系列，这意味着拥有 Genesis Fancy Birds 和 $FNC 的持有者将能够加入想要在 Fancy 平台上玩耍和赚钱的新用户。

随着 Fancy Games 平台的扩展，持有有史以来第一套游戏还将获得额外的福利和好处。 更多内容将在游戏发布后进行。

细节如下：

**200只OG鸟**-每只OG鸟有机会最多造**4**只Fancy birds，并且有优先权。注意:在200个OG中，有185个是非常早期的Discord用户，他们在Cointelegraph最近的文章之前就发现了这个项目。在接下来的几周将会有15个更多的位置赠送给非常有战略意义的顾问，赠送者，以及最活跃的社区成员。

title: STARS Token Distribution and Airdrop
body:
Stargaze is one of the first NFT markets to launch in the Cosmos ecosystem. Cosmos is a network of custom interoperable blockchains. It is currently the second largest ecosystem by volume, and includes Terra, Cosmos Hub, Thorchain, and Osmosis.

Stargaze aims to be a decentralized NFT market, totally owned and governed by its users. Therefore, distribution of STARS has to be equitable, accessible, and cover a large surface area.

## Token Release Schedule

A fair initial distribution is pivotal in setting the future direction of a network. Paired with a thoughtful inflationary release schedule, a network can optimize its token distribution.

The distribution of STARS is designed to front-load inflation in order to bootstrap the network. This is a similar issuance schedule to Bitcoin. However, instead of halvings, issuance will be cut by 1/3 each year (by multiplying the current issuance by a reduction factor of 2/3). Osmosis was the first protocol to use a [“thirding” token release schedule](https://medium.com/osmosis/osmo-token-distribution-ae27ea2bb4db) and heavily inspired Stargaze’s design.

For some background on using token incentives to bootstrap new networks, check out this great [tweet thread](https://twitter.com/cdixon/status/1440026947036356619?s=20) by Chris Dixon.

!["Thirding" release schedule](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TwRgLvwwmYuxQ8c4BqR3f.png?height=768&width=1024)

Stargaze will start with an initial supply of 1 billion STARS. An additional 1 billion STARS will be issued the first year. With this "thirding" schedule, the issuance for the following year will be 667M STARS. This leads to an **asymptotic max supply of 4 billion STARS**.

![Total supply formula](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4zhWsUYN9KbC12rOFyAZM.png?height=126&width=1284)

![Issuance calculations](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ooIF-U44MYirt21oEg4LL.png?height=1542&width=1630)

Stargaze starts off decentralized on day one with a genesis supply that distributes the majority of the tokens to community members. The Foundation will hold a strategic reserve of tokens, and will drive adoption of the protocol by delegating to validators, onboarding creators, and providing grants for ecosystem development.

![Community-focused genesis supply](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZTtjhTqZNqm1rNESQq8j2.png?height=768&width=1024)

After 5 years, the initial distribution is only 27.6% of the entire token supply. This issuance schedule allows Stargaze to grow and adapt its ownership to new creators, curators, validators, delegators, and other stakeholders.

![Genesis supply vs. new issuance after 5 years](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k_VH9Rk86klZ7IXo2ZbKC.png?height=768&width=1024)

Tokens for seed investors, validators, founders, and advisors are locked up for 1 year, and linearly vest after that for another 6 months - 1 year. This helps align values with the the development team and early stakeholders.

## The Airdrop

The goal of the Stargaze airdrop is to reach the most active participants in the Cosmos ecosystem. Stakers and liquidity providers are more likely to be more active than just token holders. Therefore, Stargaze is doing its airdrop to a mix of network participants:

* **ATOM stakers**
* **OSMO stakers or liquidity providers**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Cosmos Hub**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Osmosis**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Regen Network**

For each role above, you will be able to claim **2,453 STARS**. Distributing a fixed amount is in the spirit of the original Uniswap airdrop, giving every user more or less an equal starting point. In order to claim your airdrop, you have to perform 4-5 actions on Stargaze when it launches. If you have used [Osmosis](http://osmosis.zone/) or [Rabbithole](https://rabbithole.gg/), you’re already familiar with performing tasks to claim tokens. Some claimable actions include bidding on NFTs, staking, and voting in governance.

Some minimums were put in place to prevent dust accounts and those attempting to game airdrops:

* **ATOM staker: 5 ATOM minimum staked**
* **OSMO staker: 50 OSMO minimum staked**

Furthermore, delegations to centralized exchange validators were excluded.

For example, if you’re an ATOM staker and OSMO LP, and meet the above minimums, then your airdrop reward is 4,906 STARS.

Osmosis liquidity providers get the airdrop regardless if LP tokens are bonded or not.

Airdrop claimable amounts start decaying 4 months after the launch of the NFT market. The decaying process linearly decreases the claimable amount for another 4 months.

![Airdrop must be claimed to prevent decay](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3_QgqhG1LETOtyBdL0a7P.png?height=768&width=1024)

After the airdrop claim period, unclaimed STARS are sent to the Community Pool.

Snapshots were taken on Oct 11th, 2021 from Cosmos Hub, Osmosis, and Regen Network.

To see how much STARS you’re eligible to claim, please visit <https://stargaze.zone/airdrop>.

***Note: Airdrops won’t be claimable until after Phase 3 of launch. Please see Phase 3 below.***

http://stargaze.zone/airdrop

## Reward Distribution

New token reward distribution will be optimized to facilitate the operations of the NFT market.

The initial breakdown per block will be:

![Per block distribution](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UzjJ1v4qZ-bF5zw1BY9kr.png?height=768&width=1024)

All chain parameters can be changed via governance vote. Everything suggested in this post are sensible defaults. We expect governance to adapt and change the protocol as it matures.

### NFT Incentives

45% of block rewards are set aside for NFT bidding and staking incentives. Token holders will be able to earn yield by bidding and staking on NFTs for certain periods of time. An upcoming post will outline this mechanic in detail.

If governance determines that NFT incentives are too high for achieving the desired effect of the protocol, they may direct these incentives towards the Community Pool where they can be spent later.

### Staking Rewards

As per the course with proof-of-stake networks, validators (node operators) earn rewards for securing the network. They also accept delegations from token holders, and charge a commission of 5% or greater for providing the service.

Nearly 100 validators were selected to join mainnet after 3 testnets, 2 of which were incentivized. They will earn 35% of all block rewards.

### Developer Rewards

Initially, 15% of block rewards will go to fund the team that contributes to the development of Stargaze. Each account gets a specific weight set by governance. When a developer is no longer contributing, governance can choose to modify their weight or remove their allocation.

### Community Pool

The Community Pool is the main DAO that operates the network. It is responsible for voting on parameter changes, software upgrades, community matters, and more. It will receive 5% of all block rewards.

## Phased Launch

Since Stargaze is a layer 1 blockchain with many moving parts, it will launch in phases.

* **Phase 0: Chain launch with 0% inflation (Oct 29th)**
* **Phase 1: Liquidity pools on [Osmosis](http://osmosis.zone/) and [Gravity DEX](https://cosmos.network/gravity-dex/)**
* **Phase 2: Governance proposal to enable inflation**
* **Phase 3: Web app launch with first NFT drop**

More details about the liquidity pools will be forthcoming. Please follow us on social media (links below) for updates. They are planned for 2-3 weeks after Phase 0, and have to go through governance to be funded via the Community Pool.

New tokens won’t be issued until after Phase 2, when inflation kicks in. At this time you’ll be able to stake STARS at [stargaze.zone](http://stargaze.zone/) via [Keplr Wallet](http://keplr.app/).

Phase 3 is expected to be completed before the end of the year. Airdrops will be claimable starting in this phase.

## Follow Us

To follow along with Stargaze developments, check us out on Twitter at <https://twitter.com/StargazeZone>, and join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE).

https://twitter.com/StargazeZone

[https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE](https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE)

Happy Stargazing ✨🔭

title: Answers to Daonomics Questions
body:
> **The idea that we need crypto policies hinges on two big assumptions. First, that DAOs will own stakes in other DAOs. Second, that if DAOs own other DAOs, then DAOs are at greater risk of being raided. Are both of these assumptions true?**

DAOs will own stakes in their vendors’ DAOs because not doing so would prevent them from becoming an "automated" company.

If a DAO owns voting rights in their vendored DAO, they can write purchasing agreements into *code,* which prevents every transaction from being voted upon. If the vendor DAO does not give stakes, then the on-chain program that runs the purchaser DAO cannot trust the vendor.

In other words, the purchaser DAO can't create a public `sellUsYourProduct` function, because that function would become an exploit for another program to lie to the DAO about delivering goods and steal money.

Instead, the DAO would have to pick a particular vendor and stick with them, effectively limiting competition and ensuring that the DAO is over-paying. In this system, the DAO is paying extra to "trust" the vendor; which makes sense in the old economy. But, owning DAO tokens makes it possible to *not* need to trust the vendor (because you have control over it), which allows a marketplace to spin up for that vendored product, reducing the prices you would be otherwise paying, plus not forcing votes all the time.

> **Are crypto policies DAOs themselves, where actions are taken according to votes? Or are they fully code-based? Are they run automatically or are they invoked ad-hoc?**

Cryptopolicies are not DAOs. They are just a category of a smart contract, they don't have to be controlled by anyone.

But you could imagine a "Lawfirm DAO" that creates cryptopolicies (such as ones that remove bad actors in a supply chain) in exchange for the tokens of that supply chain.

For example, imagine you and I run coffee shop DAOs. We've discovered that our coffee roasters are both getting their beans from poor working conditions. You and I can collectively pool our CoffeeRoaster DAO tokens in a cryptopolicy which votes to boycott the PoorWorkingCondition DAO, or to fork the PoorWorkingCondition's DAO tokens, fire the management and rehire someone else.

Some cryptopolicies could be automatic, and you could have smart contracts that create cryptopolicies.

> **Have I understood correctly the virtues of a crypto policy? What am I missing?**

A cryptopolicy isn't inherently good; but it does offer a solution to multiple potential problems in Daonomics.

Unlike old-world policies; cryptopolicies allow for immediate and reservable action on previously difficult collective action problems, such as climate change. (Though, my assumption is that climate change will be solved in the existing market by falling clean energy prices and pre-existing government pressure).

In a collective action problem, each individual actor can't act alone. But in a cryptopolicy, you don't need to trust that other actors will operate in good faith; because blockchains allow you to pool your votes together without trusting a third party. All actors can act instantly only when the pool of people is large enough.

title: Filecoin的GAS费用
body:
Filecoin 链上的 Gas 费用模式基本复制了执行了 EIP-1559 的以太坊，通过基础费用+小费的形式使得 Gas 费用可以更好地被预测。而随着时间的推移，基础费用会随着之前的总 Gas 费用进行调整，并且最重要的是，基础费用会直接被销毁而并非支付给矿工。

Filecoin 上线之初，由于忌惮于其严格的惩罚措施，以及大部分矿工仍在不断实验最优、性价比最高的配置，虽然算力一直在有序增长，但 Gas 费用一直保持在较低的价格。上线后的一个月之内的时间里，封装有效存储的 Gas 费用最高不过 0.4FIL/T，加上彼时 FIL 价格并不高，所以这些费用仍然可以承受，大部分矿商在出售机器时的利润也足以覆盖这一块费用。

Filecoin 一路走来也收到了不少非议，以太坊创始人 Vitalik Buterin 也曾表示 Filecoin 能给区块链带来的扩展性可能非常有限。但我们无法预知未来，与 Filecoin 同为存储基础设施的 Arweave、Crust、Swarm 等项目，都暂时没有看到类似以太坊上 DeFi 一样爆发式的需求，基于区块链的存储能否弥补云和本地存储的劣势，区块链能否快速进化到产生规模化存储需求的程度，下一个一年或下一个十年，值得我们拭目以待。

title: 欢迎来到树屋—Fancy Birds
body:
![第一章](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7i8WW4RfegkUjLlFkTVct.png?height=437&width=875)

### 第1章

欢迎所有的Fancy birds来到树屋!对我们来说，这是过山车般的一周。自从Pre-seed轮融资的消息在Cointelegraph上公布以来，The Discord一直在快速增长。我们非常感谢OGs和Early Birds，在我们专注于扩展DAO的同时，他们帮助保持了Treehouse的有序。首先让我们谈谈我们是如何走到这一步的……

## 起源

Fancy Birds是核心DAO贡献者**Mr. Fancy**的创意，正如你们中的一些人在Discord中所知道的那样。**Mr. Fancy**是一名长期的竞技玩家，有组织电子竞技比赛的背景，是加拿大的顶级玩家，并在过去两年参与了区块链领域。Fancy Birds 的想法是在观察到许多基于 PFP 的简单 NFT 项目无法兑现完整游戏的承诺后产生的。他还观察到许多已经被证实的游戏循环可以更好地用作P2E和PVP元素。 Fancy先生立即开始与两个DAO贡献者**Fancy-janitor**和**Mad-Badger**合作，组成一个DAO团队，能够完成他们一直以来最喜欢的游戏主循环之一——Fancy Birds就这样形成了。该团队不知疲倦地完成了项目的NFT部分，并在Rinkeby测试环境下完成了完整的第一版游戏。与此同时，该团队开始在Discord和Twitter上分享他们的一些预告片。 接下来发生的事让每个人都大吃一惊。

Illuvium 的联合创始人 Kieran Warwick 在推特上发表了关于 P2E Flappy Bird 的想法。

![P2E Flappy bird 在哪儿？](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A0pZzYRpM0TjQ5LEu-mmF.png?height=896&width=875)

在有机会最终向 Illuvium 联合创始人演示工作游戏并解释Fancy Games在v1版本之后的扩展路线图后，Kieran 立即担任战略顾问。接下来是数周的电话和演示，第一轮种子轮已完成。

这轮融资的主要投资者包括**Synthetix的Kain Warwick、天使投资人Santiago Santos(前parafi)、Sushi的0xMaki、1inch的Anton Bukov、Ankr的Ryan Fang、Aave的Stani Kulechov、Barnbridge的Tyler Ward、Quantstamp的Richard Ma、Fei Protocol的Joey Santoro以及Tokemak团队**。

Fancy Games DAO被这个项目的兴趣所震撼，并很荣幸有这样一个明星云集的区块链创始人开始这段旅程!

## 接下来会发生什么

### $FNC 代币

本周 Fancy Team 的目标是带来预种子轮VC以及完全关闭最后一轮种子轮。 完成后，我们将与社区分享，以最终确定公开发售的日期，然后是 Fancy Birds Genesis mint的正式日期。

截至目前，预种子轮占总供应的2.5%。种子轮将包括另外7.5%的供应，然后是另外10%的公共轮。剩下的代币百分比包括10%的理事会管理国库，10%的团队，20%的流动性奖励和40%的游戏奖励。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Q2FEjTudd4c5ILZ4xtWVw.png?height=1000&width=1000)

$FNC将既是治理代币，也是P2E代币经济的支柱。在专门的“树屋日记”章节中，我们将对代币经济进行更详细的分析。

### Genesis NFTs的白名单

总共将有**8888**只创世Fancy birds。创世纪系列的需求非常高，这是可以理解的。

Genesis Fancy Birds 将是唯一具有繁殖能力的系列，这意味着拥有 Genesis Fancy Birds 和 $FNC 的持有者将能够加入想要在 Fancy 平台上玩耍和赚钱的新用户。

随着 Fancy Games 平台的扩展，持有有史以来第一套游戏还将获得额外的福利和好处。 更多内容将在游戏发布后进行。

细节如下：

**200只OG鸟**-每只OG鸟有机会最多造**4**只Fancy birds，并且有优先权。注意:在200个OG中，有185个是非常早期的Discord用户，他们在Cointelegraph最近的文章之前就发现了这个项目。在接下来的几周将会有15个更多的位置赠送给非常有战略意义的顾问，赠送者，以及最活跃的社区成员。

**1500个早鸟**-每个早鸟将有机会制造最多**2**个Fancy birds。在发这篇文章的时候，还有900多个位置没有被认领!一定要加入Discord社区，并关注Twitter，在接下来的几周通过竞赛和赠品获得Early Bird的机会。然而，Early Birds总是开放的，不会基于等级或严格数量的邀请给出白名单，以防止bot活动。这并不意味着真正的用户会被忽视——对于那些积极参与渠道，贡献想法，进行日常对话和邀请的人，仍然会有手动的Early Bird，直到我们达到1500个极限!

这样就剩下**5088**只Fancy birds可供公众出售了。

### 当前开发更新

Fancy团队目前正在多个区块链平台上进行测试，从性能和安全性方面选择最好的平台。游戏已经在Rinkeby上成功测试，这意味着无论我们选择哪个区块链都将与EVM兼容。这可以在以太坊、IMX、Fantom、Polygon等主网。我们会在未来1-2周内尽快通知社区。

v1版本包含什么?

对于那些不熟悉这款游戏的人，我们将提供PVE(单人玩家+排行榜)和PVP(多人在线比赛)。

第一个版本将有Fancy创世纪NFT的每日和每周P2E任务。玩家将能够使用$FNC自定义他们的非功能性装备，参与排行榜活动，以及在市场上花费$FNC购买独家NFT装备和协作道具。还将能够培育 Genesis 集以吸引新用户。我们的目标是为V2更新做好育种准备，但现在这是开发团队的首要任务，我们希望更早地发布它。我们还将发布未来版本的开发更新和我们正在添加的功能。该团队正在与一些领先的游戏设计专家讨论，以确定用户扩展的最佳策略，因为对游戏的需求远远超出了创世纪和婴儿起源的Fancy bird。

下一个部署的游戏模式将是实时PVP，目前正在开发中。这意味着用户将能够相互竞争，以证明谁是最漂亮的鸟!这将包括面对面，以及每日和每周的PVP比赛。敬请关注更多信息。

### 社区

“树屋”在Discord上拥有强大的1.9万名用户，在Twitter上有3000名用户。感谢每一个在discord中帮助树屋成长为成长最快的社区之一的人。让我们继续共同努力，尽可能扩大Fancy Games的生态系统。我们喜欢每天和你在社区里，迫不及待地想和你一起玩Fancy bird! 保持幻想

discord:<https://discord.gg/fancybirds>
Twitter: <https://twitter.com/Fancybirdsio>
网站:<https://fancybirds.io/>

title: A deep dive into the basic-1 anchor example
body:
Today we'll be going over the basic-1 anchor example, doing a deep dive of why everything is the way it is. This will cover new ground, including the addition of

Other editions: [basic-0](https://mirror.xyz/0x840B1dC2abb99f1F86D549303719610F346B2aaF/w3-WcRd8aablvFf8Er5qH4H4b-x-8UVfhElMv6Uwick) deep dive.

You'll also need the [prerequisites found here](https://project-serum.github.io/anchor/getting-started/installation.html). I'm basically re-creating the tutorial found [here](https://project-serum.github.io/anchor/tutorials/tutorial-1.html).

## Getting started

To get started, clone the repo and go to the example.

    git clone https://github.com/project-serum/anchor
    cd anchor/examples/tutorial/basic-1

## High-level components

This example has two high-level components, the program itself (at `programs/basic-1/src/lib.rs`) and the integration tests (found at `tests/basic-1.js`).

We'll be treating this example here as if we were doing local development, using the integration tests to iterate quickly.

## Dive in

Let's dive in immediately and run

    # Ensure you don't have solana-test-validator running!
    anchor test

We should see the following output:

      basic-1
        ✔ Creates and initializes an account in a single atomic transaction (simplified) (143ms)
        ✔ Updates a previously created account (411ms)


      2 passing (557ms)

Our tests are currently passing, as expected!

Let's dive in to the program and use the integration tests as a tool to see what changing different pieces of the program would do.

## The account struct

    #[account]
    pub struct MyAccount {
        pub data: u64,
    }

This struct defines what shape the account data will have. This specific account will be a struct with a field `data` of type `u64`.

Try removing the `#[account]` attribute and re-running `anchor test`.

    ... snip ...

    error[E0277]: the trait bound `MyAccount: Clone` is not satisfied
      --> programs/basic-1/src/lib.rs:34:21
       |
    34 |     pub my_account: Account<'info, MyAccount>,
       |                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `Clone` is not implemented for `MyAccount`
       |
      ::: /home/camden/anchor/lang/src/account.rs:12:78
       |
    12 | pub struct Account<'info, T: AccountSerialize + AccountDeserialize + Owner + Clone> {
       |                                                                              ----- required by this bound in `anchor_lang::Account`

When we define an Account, the associated account data type must have these traits. The important thing here is that any account struct must have the `#[account]` attribute so Anchor knows how to work with that struct.

Add back the `#[account]` attribute before continuing.

### Allocating space

Let's add in a new field on the struct now:

    #[account]
    pub struct MyAccount {
        pub data: u64,
        pub another_data: u64,
    }

Then run `anchor test`

    ... snip ...

      logs: [
        'Program Fg6PaFpoGXkYsidMpWTK6W2BeZ7FEfcYkg476zPFsLnS invoke [1]',
        'Program 11111111111111111111111111111111 invoke [2]',
        'Program 11111111111111111111111111111111 success',
        'Program log: Custom program error: 0xa3',
        'Program Fg6PaFpoGXkYsidMpWTK6W2BeZ7FEfcYkg476zPFsLnS consumed 9553 of 200000 compute units',
        'Program Fg6PaFpoGXkYsidMpWTK6W2BeZ7FEfcYkg476zPFsLnS failed: custom program error: 0xa3'
      ]
    }
        1) Creates and initializes an account in a single atomic transaction (simplified)
        2) Updates a previously created account


      0 passing (67ms)
      2 failing

    ... snip ...

Our logs from invoking Solana aren't super helpul here. We definitely reached the system program (11....11) but we failed to initialize.

There aren't a ton of good clues here, but what did we actually change? We added another field to the struct, which ends up increasing the amount of space we need.

The fix here is to look above to where it says `space = 8 + 8`. We can change that to `space = 8 + 8 + 8`, and run `anchor test` again, which will pass.

What did we learn? We have to be careful about the space we allocate for our account data and make sure that we allocate the right amount of space. We have to allocate 8 bytes for the discrimnator, 8 bytes for data, and 8 bytes for another_data.

Let's revert the changes we've made up to this point.

## The Initialize accounts

The initialize accounts are defined here:

    #[derive(Accounts)]
    pub struct Initialize<'info> {
        #[account(init, payer = user, space = 8 + 8)]
        pub my_account: Account<'info, MyAccount>,
        #[account(mut)]
        pub user: Signer<'info>,
        pub system_program: Program<'info, System>,
    }

Solana requires that we specify *all* the accounts that are used in the instruction handler because validators need to be able to operate on many accounts in parallel. Getting a mutable reference to an account will rqeuire blocking on any further changes to that account.

## The system program account

If you look at the Initialize handler above, you'll notice that the system*program account is never explicitly used. However, try removing the system*program and the program won't compile. That's because we've defined, in this struct, `my_account` as an account that is to be initialized. As a result, anchor requires us to include the system*program because the system*program is the program capable of initializing accounts.

If we look at the Update accounts, we'll see that there is no system*program defined. That is because we are just updating that account's data and not initalizing it, so anchor doesn't require us to have access to the system*program.

## The user account

We also don't explicitly use the user account in the instruction handler for Initialize. Let's try removing it (along with the `#[account(mut)])` attribute).

This won't compile either. That's because the account that's paying for the rent is the user, so we'll get a compilation error.

#### Why does the user account have the mutable attribute?

Let's re-add the user account line, but leave off the `#[account(mut)]` piece. This compiles, so let's run `anchor test`.

This actually works. I don't know if anchor test isn't testing all the constraints we expect, but I don't think this would work in a client setting. My expectation would be that this doesn't work because the user account needs to be mutable for the program to debit the account to pay for the space allocation.

**Open question--don't quite get this...**

#### The Signer struct

The Signer struct just tells anchor that the user account has signed the transaction. Anchor knows that it doesn't have to fetch or deserialize the data associated with this account.

## my_account

Finally, we have the account that actually holds the data for our program.

We've already covered the pieces of the attribute that this is tagged with, so let's look at the account itself.

    pub my_account: Account<'info, MyAccount>

This tells anchor that we have an account here with data. Anchor should expect to deserialize the data into a MyAccount object, which we already went over.

## The Update accounts

Very simply, the Update instruction only requires one account, which is the original account that we stored the data in. This has the mutable attribute, because we want to be able to update the account data.

## The instruction handlers

Finally, we can move on to the instruction handlers!

These are virtually identical in how they are implemented in the code. They both take two parameters, take a mutable reference to my_account, and then update the data.

What happens under the hood is very different though, and the differences are entirely because of the different account specifications.

When we call initailize, anchor, under the hood, is making a call to the system program to initialize the account at my_account's address. Only after initializing the account does it update the data.

The update instruction takes an already initailized account with this type of data and just updates it.

Note that we never have to "commit" our changes in any way. We use our mutable reference to the account's data and anchor will automatically update the account's data for us.

Thanks for reading this deep dive. I'll be continuing to do more deep dives on these anchor examples.

title: $04 Deri 和 Mcb跟踪报告
body:
Deri 和 mcb都属于链上衍生品领域，关注他们主要是因为：

一.**binance smart chain （bsc）推出一个10亿美金的生态基金**，[链接](https://www.binance.org/en/blog/binance-launches-one-billion-binance-smart-chain-fund-to-reach-one-billion-crypto-users/)。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eOhMO_2qcsBSvYc2-DvRa.png?height=623&width=1030)

根据bsc最新公告，**mcb和deri等衍生项目将成为首批加入流动性奖励计划的试点。**

这是两个明牌项目，发公告的当天市场已经有表现。

![defi公告当天15分钟走势图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/acdT5MWUQBxcgek1Z0gbq.png?height=578&width=919)

![mcb公告当天15分钟走势图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UzeU_QTOM2fNLxG8whsvZ.png?height=574&width=941)

从二级市场的反映来看，deri走势强于mcb

**二.疑问**

但接下来，binance mvb3（最具价值建设者），出来了。

![mvb3 9月月星](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1NkzrMy1D7vOzc_2LaEXn.png?height=733&width=1303)

在mvb3九月月星中，我们只看到mcb而没有deri。[链接](https://www.binance.org/en/blog/mvbiii-september-monthly-stars/)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KSjHmgwlVpGCyDXexVwVu.png?height=797&width=898)

那么如果只梭哈一个，到底是梭哈mcb还是梭哈deri了？

如果接下来binance安排上币，到底是上他们两个中的谁了？

这里我比较迷惑了：

1\.最开始的10亿美金加速基金，二级市场的表现deri明显要好。

2\.但mcb上了bsc-mvb3月度之星，之前很多上的都安排上binance了，比如羊驼，mobox，chress；从这里看mcb明显好点。

**三.怎么办，二选一的事情都比较烦恼。**

除去烦恼的一个方法是两个都要，但我还是想只选一个。

只有一条根本的路了，详细去对比，项目官网，实际体验，社区反应。

**四.详细对比**

### 1.官方

mcb ：[官网](https://mcdex.io/homepage/)      [推特](https://twitter.com/MonteCarloDEX/with_replies) 3.44万人      [电报](https://t.me/Mcdex)15118人    [discord](https://discord.com/invite/uut3V3D) 3320 人

deri：[官网](https://bridge.deri.finance/?locale=zh#/bridge)        [推特](https://twitter.com/DeriProtocol)3.36万人        [电报](https://t.me/DeriProtocol) 14971人    discord 无

社区方面数据都差不多，deri没有discord。

mcb电报主要发公告，交流在discord；deri交流全部放电报

### 2.官网可见投资机构对比

![mcb](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cn4-267kGQWKcBRixyIOa.png?height=731&width=1709)

![deri](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Q8Oh9pCdq_6vKbXNsLVBw.png?height=777&width=1709)

投资人团队，mcb强于deri

### 3.看mcb 和deri 数据

![mcb - tvl](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lpfuFVLqdHA3ngzjXDDLs.png?height=558&width=1446)

![deri](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nJ27RGYb6zzwmFy98G9Sp.png?height=557&width=1451)

mcb 1.8亿多，deri2900多万。

mcb强于deri。

看到这里好像很明确了，二选一就mcb！

title: 1999: 7.17 A Network Implodes, Another Explodes
body:
1998 
  
 It began in Southeast Asia. Past excesses in the emerging markets imploded.  
  
 It spread through first the currencies, bonds and then local stock markets. Financial contagion spread to world's real economies.  
  
 Many people, far from the markets, suffered, starved, or died. There were bailouts, financial aid, austerity deals and interest rate cuts. The crisis faded, and a new fever began to spread.  
  
 Networks of the markets funded a new network, the Internet.  
  
 Mr. Market, high on bailouts, jumped off cliffs to build rockets on the way down.  
  
 The same networks which spread disaster last year, had a fever for the future.  
  
 Like every year, this year had crises and tragedies, but it also had clues. The year’s clues included rockets and future tech giants.  
  
 Google is founded in Menlo Park, California.  
 Tencent is founded in Shenzhen, China.  
 AOL bought Netscape for 4.2B USD.  
 Microsoft was sued by the US DOJ and 20 US states for an antitrust case.  
  
 Ice was found in the Moon's polar craters, enough for a future colony.  
 Japan launched a probe to Mars.  
  
 A Russian rocket launched from Kazakhstan, carried the first part of the International Space Station, the 21 ton Zarya Module. The Space Shuttle Endeavour launches the first American section of the International Space Station, 'Unity'. It docks with Zarya.  
  
 The Beastie Boys released hit, 'Intergalactic'.  
 The sky was not the limit.  
 The Internet was coming. 

 
 **2877 Earth, The Necklace, The Marketplace Square  
 ** 
 "They've had eyes on us the moment we got off the transport. What were your instructions from your grandfather, besides not opening the package and sneaking a look?"  
  
 "I was told that someone would meet me in the market. That I would hand it over to them, and that would be it."  
  
 "Change of plans, I have to get information from whoever shows up. The reality is that person not going to "THE person". We'll see."  
  
 "If they see we don't have the item on us, what happens?"  
  
 "My guess is the recipient doesn't know either just like you were kept in the dark. I want you to know one more thing, I won't let anything happen to your Grandfather or family. But it's my job to take it back home."  
  
 She looked at me, realizing the danger of not delivering but she said nothing.  
  
 The Marketplace was busy, the locals were selling to regulars and visitors. There were performances and event feeds in the quieter pockets between the clusters of shops and tourist attractions.  
  
 We were both wearing tactical underneath, and I snuck on a few items from the diplomatic bag. I didn't ask for anyone from the regular detail at the consulate. I wasn't there long enough to know who to rely on.  
  
 I'm sure most of the consulate's security staff was vetted but none of them served with me. That's the kind of help I wanted. 
  
 We'll play tourists, with a shoulder bag.  
  
 I see a group walking through the crowd towards us. They walk different, and carry themselves the way my crew would.  
  
 They didn't just send one person.

title: 欢迎来到树屋—Fancy Birds
body:
![第一章](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7i8WW4RfegkUjLlFkTVct.png?height=437&width=875)

### 第1章

欢迎所有的Fancy birds来到树屋!对我们来说，这是过山车般的一周。自从Pre-seed轮融资的消息在Cointelegraph上公布以来，The Discord一直在快速增长。我们非常感谢OGs和Early Birds，在我们专注于扩展DAO的同时，他们帮助保持了Treehouse的有序。首先让我们谈谈我们是如何走到这一步的……

## 起源

Fancy Birds是核心DAO贡献者**Mr. Fancy**的创意，正如你们中的一些人在Discord中所知道的那样。**Mr. Fancy**是一名长期的竞技玩家，有组织电子竞技比赛的背景，是加拿大的顶级玩家，并在过去两年参与了区块链领域。Fancy Birds 的想法是在观察到许多基于 PFP 的简单 NFT 项目无法兑现完整游戏的承诺后产生的。他还观察到许多已经被证实的游戏循环可以更好地用作P2E和PVP元素。 Fancy先生立即开始与两个DAO贡献者**Fancy-janitor**和**Mad-Badger**合作，组成一个DAO团队，能够完成他们一直以来最喜欢的游戏主循环之一——Fancy Birds就这样形成了。该团队不知疲倦地完成了项目的NFT部分，并在Rinkeby测试环境下完成了完整的第一版游戏。与此同时，该团队开始在Discord和Twitter上分享他们的一些预告片。 接下来发生的事让每个人都大吃一惊。

Illuvium 的联合创始人 Kieran Warwick 在推特上发表了关于 P2E Flappy Bird 的想法。

![P2E Flappy bird 在哪儿？](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A0pZzYRpM0TjQ5LEu-mmF.png?height=896&width=875)

在有机会最终向 Illuvium 联合创始人演示工作游戏并解释Fancy Games在v1版本之后的扩展路线图后，Kieran 立即担任战略顾问。接下来是数周的电话和演示，第一轮种子轮已完成。

这轮融资的主要投资者包括**Synthetix的Kain Warwick、天使投资人Santiago Santos(前parafi)、Sushi的0xMaki、1inch的Anton Bukov、Ankr的Ryan Fang、Aave的Stani Kulechov、Barnbridge的Tyler Ward、Quantstamp的Richard Ma、Fei Protocol的Joey Santoro以及Tokemak团队**。

Fancy Games DAO被这个项目的兴趣所震撼，并很荣幸有这样一个明星云集的区块链创始人开始这段旅程!

## 接下来会发生什么

### $FNC 代币

本周 Fancy Team 的目标是带来预种子轮VC以及完全关闭最后一轮种子轮。 完成后，我们将与社区分享，以最终确定公开发售的日期，然后是 Fancy Birds Genesis mint的正式日期。

截至目前，预种子轮占总供应的2.5%。种子轮将包括另外7.5%的供应，然后是另外10%的公共轮。剩下的代币百分比包括10%的理事会管理国库，10%的团队，20%的流动性奖励和40%的游戏奖励。

![$FNC 代币模型](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JQBHoxd6WIPty89Xb4aR2.png?height=982&width=956)

$FNC将既是治理代币，也是P2E代币经济的支柱。在专门的“树屋日记”章节中，我们将对代币经济进行更详细的分析。

### Genesis NFTs的白名单

总共将有**8888**只创世Fancy birds。创世纪系列的需求非常高，这是可以理解的。

Genesis Fancy Birds 将是唯一具有繁殖能力的系列，这意味着拥有 Genesis Fancy Birds 和 $FNC 的持有者将能够加入想要在 Fancy 平台上玩耍和赚钱的新用户。

随着 Fancy Games 平台的扩展，持有有史以来第一套游戏还将获得额外的福利和好处。 更多内容将在游戏发布后进行。

细节如下：

**200只OG鸟**-每只OG鸟有机会最多造**4**只Fancy birds，并且有优先权。注意:在200个OG中，有185个是非常早期的Discord用户，他们在Cointelegraph最近的文章之前就发现了这个项目。在接下来的几周将会有15个更多的位置赠送给非常有战略意义的顾问，赠送者，以及最活跃的社区成员。

**1500个早鸟**-每个早鸟将有机会制造最多**2**个Fancy birds。在发这篇文章的时候，还有900多个位置没有被认领!一定要加入Discord社区，并关注Twitter，在接下来的几周通过竞赛和赠品获得Early Bird的机会。然而，Early Birds总是开放的，不会基于等级或严格数量的邀请给出白名单，以防止bot活动。这并不意味着真正的用户会被忽视——对于那些积极参与渠道，贡献想法，进行日常对话和邀请的人，仍然会有手动的Early Bird，直到我们达到1500个极限!

这样就剩下**5088**只Fancy birds可供公众出售了。

### 当前开发更新

Fancy团队目前正在多个区块链平台上进行测试，从性能和安全性方面选择最好的平台。游戏已经在Rinkeby上成功测试，这意味着无论我们选择哪个区块链都将与EVM兼容。这可以在以太坊、IMX、Fantom、Polygon等主网。我们会在未来1-2周内尽快通知社区。

v1版本包含什么?

对于那些不熟悉这款游戏的人，我们将提供PVE(单人玩家+排行榜)和PVP(多人在线比赛)。

第一个版本将有Fancy创世纪NFT的每日和每周P2E任务。玩家将能够使用$FNC自定义他们的非功能性装备，参与排行榜活动，以及在市场上花费$FNC购买独家NFT装备和协作道具。还将能够培育 Genesis 集以吸引新用户。我们的目标是为V2更新做好育种准备，但现在这是开发团队的首要任务，我们希望更早地发布它。我们还将发布未来版本的开发更新和我们正在添加的功能。该团队正在与一些领先的游戏设计专家讨论，以确定用户扩展的最佳策略，因为对游戏的需求远远超出了创世纪和婴儿起源的Fancy bird。

下一个部署的游戏模式将是实时PVP，目前正在开发中。这意味着用户将能够相互竞争，以证明谁是最漂亮的鸟!这将包括面对面，以及每日和每周的PVP比赛。敬请关注更多信息。

### 社区

“树屋”在Discord上拥有强大的1.9万名用户，在Twitter上有3000名用户。感谢每一个在discord中帮助树屋成长为成长最快的社区之一的人。让我们继续共同努力，尽可能扩大Fancy Games的生态系统。我们喜欢每天和你在社区里，迫不及待地想和你一起玩Fancy bird! 保持幻想

title: Timeswap 测试网指南
body:
欢迎时间旅行者！
系好安全带，踏上太空之旅，穿越时空，探索 DeFi 2.0 的仙境
对于初次探索的人，我们为您带来了我们的用户指南。但在我们开始之前，让我们向您简要介绍一下我们的飞船是如何工作的。开始了！
进入 Timeswap 的宇宙飞船
Timeswap 是第一个完全去中心化的基于 AMM 的货币市场协议，它无需许可、非托管、gas 高效，并且无需预言机或清算人即可工作，允许任何人为任何 ERC-20 代币创建借贷市场。
Timeswap 专有的 3 变量 AMM 是由 Uniswap 的恒定乘积 AMM 驱动的。它通过允许用户决定他们的风险状况 并相应地为每笔借贷交易设置利率和抵押品，为最终用户提供了灵活性。
作为 DeFi 原语，考虑到池的固定期限设计，Timeswap 的免许可池可用于创建固定收益市场、期权和各种其他金融产品。
我们的 Alpha 版本目前在 Rinkeby 测试网上可用。检查它在这里。

如何连接您的钱包？
点击右上角提供的“连接钱包（Rinkeby）”选项（如下图）。它会带你到你的 Metamask 钱包。
在Metamask上切换到Rinkeby网络后，请刷新应用页面。
注意：我们很快将在 UI 中添加其他钱包支持

在哪里可以看到活动池？
在您登陆测试网页面后，在“市场”选项卡下，您将看到在其唯一令牌对标题下列出的所有活动池。您可以折叠每个令牌对以查看具有不同到期时间的可用池。
该货币对的标准池命名约定是，第一个代币是借出/借入的资产，第二个代币是抵押品。
例如： DAI-MATIC 池意味着DAI 是资产，MATIC 是抵押品。

如何铸造测试代币？
单击右上角的“Test Faucet”选项卡，为活动池铸造测试代币（如下图所示）
注意：要使用测试水龙头选项，您首先需要 Rinkeby ETH 测试代币来支付交易费用。要获得 Rinkeby ETH，请参阅此水龙头。

Before we move on to guide you further on the lending and borrowing transactions, we would like you to refer to a simple explanation on the different native tokens you will mint as part of various interactions with our pool.

1. 借贷
   我们的测试网中有两种贷款选项——默认贷款和自定义风险贷款

在 Timeswap Alpha 上借出代币的步骤
a) 违约贷款：
步骤 1：选择具有您特定到期时间偏好的代币对以启动您的借贷交易。例如，在上面的视频中，我们采用了 10 月 13 日到期的 DAI-MATIC 对。
您还可以查看每个矿池的估计 APR 和抵押因子
第二步：点击“借出”选项。
第 3 步：在出现的默认框中，您可以选择要借出的资产数量。您将能够实时查看到期时将收到的资产数量，以及在借款人 100% 违约的情况下您可以使用的抵押代币形式的保险范围。

b) 定制风险贷款：
第 1 步：您可以通过切换到“自定义风险”选项来自定义您的风险概况。您将能够看到一个滑块 ，通过自定义您希望选择的 APR 与您将获得的保险范围来调整您的风险状况。
例如，在默认风险选项中，APR/保险值恰好对应于此滑块的中心。
第 2 步：当您移动滑块时，您将能够看到您的估计 APR、抵押品系数、到期金额以及 100% 违约情况下的保险。APR 越高，预期到期金额越高，保险范围越低，反之亦然。要了解更多信息，请单击此处。
第 3 步：一旦您选择了您的风险状况，您就可以通过单击“借出”选项来完成您的借出交易。
第 4 步：在您的 Metamask 上确认后，您将能够在“借出”部分下的“仪表板”选项卡中看到您的出借头寸。
c) 索赔资产：
池到期后，贷方可以索取其资产，包括本金和所赚取的利息。如果没有实现确切的资产金额，他们将能够以借款人没收的抵押品的形式使用他们的保险。抵押品按每个贷方选择的保险范围按比例分配给贷方。
第1步：您可以查看在“您的贷款职位仪表盘”选项卡下的借节。
第二步：选择已到期的矿池，点击“ 领取”按钮领取您的资产。
第 4 步：将出现一个框，您可以在其中看到您将收到的资产金额以及违约情况下的抵押品。
2\. 借：
我们的测试网中有两种借贷模型——默认借贷和自定义风险借贷

在 Timeswap Alpha 上借用代币的步骤
要从池中借入您选择的资产，只需存入抵押品并获得贷款即可。
注：在默认情况下借款选项牛逼Ø简化用户体验，抵押品价值是基于一组默认50/50比例的债务抵押VS计算。借款人可以选择在到期前随时偿还债务，而没有被清算的风险。没有更多繁琐的维护健康因素的任务。
a) 默认借款：
第 1 步：选择您要发起借贷交易的代币对。在上面的视频中，我们在这个例子中使用了 DAI-ETH 对。
第 2 步：点击 DAI-ETH 对，下拉列表中将出现多个矿池，每个矿池具有不同的到期时间、估计的 APR 和抵押品系数。
第 3 步：选择您要借用的池，然后单击“借用”选项。
第 4 步：在单击时出现的框中，您可以选择要借入的资产数量。您将能够看到您在到期前必须偿还的资产数量，以及您需要锁定的抵押品。
b) 定制风险借贷：
第 1 步：您可以通过打开“自定义风险”选项来自定义您的风险概况。
第 2 步：在此选项下，您将能够看到一个滑块，您可以滚动以调整您的抵押品系数与您必须偿还池的利息。在更改滑块时，您将能够看到实时更改的估计 APR、抵押品系数、偿还金额和抵押品价值。您希望锁定的抵押品越低，估计的 APR 就越高，反之亦然。要了解更多信息，请单击此处。
第 3 步：一旦您选择了抵押品与利息价值，您就可以通过单击“借”选项来完成借入交易。在您的 Metamask 上确认后，您将能够在借用部分下的“仪表板”中看到您的借用头寸。

借款人可以在到期前随时偿还债务以提取抵押品。如果借款人在到期前没有偿还债务，他们的抵押品将被没收并根据每个贷方选择的保险金额分配给贷方。

Lending platform，是DEFI生态的基础设施，个人认为是和DEX并驾齐驱的两大基础设施

特地选了几个自己关注的Lending project，做一个简单的对比，主要从市场以及基本面两方面来做一个对比

如图：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6tzrtO9zEJBl-CSohVZZf.png?height=161&width=980)

首先，我想把这5个分成两个阵营，一个是传统大蓝筹，包括AAVE, COMP和XVS，另一个是新秀，包括GEIST和QBT

而大蓝筹又以**AAVE**为王者，几乎所有数据都是占优的，其中市值已经抛开第二名的**COMP**一半了，4.31的估值也是最高的

备注：TVL指的是存款总金额，借款不计入，TVL/M.C即总存款与市值的对比，越大则说明估值越多

**venus**，作为BSC上的龙头，经历一波三折后，慢慢稳下来，开始受到资金的青睐，主要体现在30日涨幅高达37%，而估值在大蓝筹板块相对来说是低的

**Geist**，**Qubit**，同样作为新秀，开局就受到投机资金的青睐，TVL爆炸，当前Geist是最夸张的，曾达到10B

可以看到TVL/M.C，一个是103，一个是72，都非常高，这是可以理解的，项目前期释放曲线陡峭，高挖矿收益吸引了资金造成了高TVL，而因为流通量少市值还没跟上来，可以再继续观察

总体来讲，排个序（看好的程度）：**GEIST > XVS > QBT > AAVE > COMP**

title: 公链分析逻辑
body:
公链发展到现阶段，其生态要良性发展，就需要从ETH上进行价值捕获，即吸引大资金进行迁移，同时要确保其生态建设高可用、全覆盖，特别是大部分公链都是想从Defi入手，在TPS上与ETH竞争。

如果把一个生态看做一个小的金融圈子，更多的生态就会有很多的生态位，每个生态站住了一个生态位，并依照这个生态位进行构建，就会占领独一无二的位置。当然有些公链的生态建设是用户用脚投票投出来的，没有用户使用的产品将会逐渐从这个生态中淘汰出去，这个公链就自然有了其生态位，也就有了自己的定位。

目前各个公链主要竞争的方向有几个：

1. defi
2. gamefi
3. nft

defi主要有链内defi和链外defi两种，为什么这么分呢？

这就要从defi所解决的问题来看，目前资金从现实世界流向链上世界，这一个接口目前主要由CEX解决，目前有部分DEX在尝试解决这部分问题，其实用DEX是比较难解决线下资金链上化的问题，避免不了传统机构的介入，Terra尝试引入各国货币和股票的办法是其中一种解决方案，在这个赛道的玩家还是以CEX为主，但趋势肯定还是要往DEX发展的，最终应该是DEX+CEX的形式存在。

而链内defi则是目前基于以太坊构建的Layer2或者其余公链所竞争的部分，由于以太坊在TPS上的局限性和高GAS，导致大量的低净值用户不得不放弃参与GAS大战，从而寻找更低的消耗，这也是一个事物发展的必然，初期的价值获利者肯定是要想办法保持利润，而后期的价值挖掘者也需要提高自己的收益，这就不可避免的让大量价值挖掘者迁移到别的生态挖掘更多的价值。

而除了Terra、WAX、Flow等因为其设计初期就决定了其解决的问题仅偏向于某些特定的方向以外，其余的公链其实是在链内Defi寻找自己的定位过程中，随着市场的爆发，一部分公链会凭借初期的生态建设进行生态卡位，导致后面的生态无法进行战略延展。

title: 我的DAO经历之三，谈JuiceBox DAO
body:
大家经常问我一个问题：如何找到这些早期DAO？我个人的经验，不外乎两个：1>在逛Discord和Twitter的时候时刻保持好奇心。不要仅仅关注大V，一般大V提的已经不算早期了；2>DAO2DAO是趋势，加入一个早期DAO，跟着它一起成长，你会有机会接触到很多上门谈合作的新创立的DAO。

JuiceBox DAO是一个典型的早期DAO，致力于开发DAO金库管理软件（代码和设计文档都开源）。我加入的时候，@juiceboxETH的follower只有几十人，Discord也就几个开发人员，自己的DAO金库里面只有几千U；今天@juiceboxETH的follower为1685人，Discord 537人，自己的DAO金库里有2百多万U。

**1.我是怎么接触到JuiceBox DAO的？**

今年7月份的时候，我在Opensea的Discord上找管理员解决多链问题，碰到@jango不断插话。@jango说他们的DAO明天发行NFT，但是希望采用盲盒的方式，Opensea的支持有问题，必须尽快解决。

然后我跟@jango聊了几句，知道他是JuiceBox DAO的创始人。

我查了下JuiceBox DAO，产品还在内测阶段。这个项目也是@jango自己首次做web3，之前他是在互联网公司工作。团队当时就3个成员，都是Discord上认识的，业余做开源开发。

**2.我为什么加入JuiceBox DAO？**

我接触的早期DAO很多，不可能都加入。JuiceBox吸引我的是什么？首先，@jango口才很好，有一定的领导力，团队有凝聚力；其次，@jango拒绝了VC，也拒绝了Gitcoin Grant，他对产品有极强的信心；最后，@jango的技术设计文档写的太漂亮了，作为开源项目很少见，后面我给了Figma链接。

@jango在讨论中发了跟Gitcoin的Austin Griffith的聊天记录，他俩后来也成了不错的朋友，JuiceBox的开发也是基于Austion开发的开源组件。Austin当时劝他参与Gitcoin Grant。

**3. 在JuiceBox DAO工作有收入吗？**

加入后第3周，DAO金库发给我300U，我都购买了治理代币。当时，Discord上的DAO频道开始讨论，需要治理代币才能加入DAO频道。

接着，不断有优秀的专业人才加入DAO，我就很少做具体工作，只是偶尔参与讨论。我也拒绝再领钱了。

目前DAO的几个核心开源开发人员，最高拿2万U/月。我个人觉得太高了，不合理，一直在投反对票。

这段时间，我最大的收获是接触到了SharkDAO和TileDAO。SharkDAO见《我的DAO经历之一，谈SharkDAO》。

**4.我在JuiceBox DAO里做了什么？**

**1>Review了@jango的技术设计文档，指出了几个问题**

尤其是联合曲线，计算公式的表述上有不准确的地方。

title: STARS Token Distribution and Airdrop
body:
Stargaze is one of the first NFT markets to launch in the Cosmos ecosystem. Cosmos is a network of custom interoperable blockchains. It is currently the second largest ecosystem by volume, and includes Terra, Cosmos Hub, Thorchain, and Osmosis.

Stargaze aims to be a decentralized NFT market, totally owned and governed by its users. Therefore, distribution of STARS has to be equitable, accessible, and cover a large surface area.

## Token Release Schedule

A fair initial distribution is pivotal in setting the future direction of a network. Paired with a thoughtful inflationary release schedule, a network can optimize its token distribution.

The distribution of STARS is designed to front-load inflation in order to bootstrap the network. This is a similar issuance schedule to Bitcoin. However, instead of halvings, issuance will be cut by 1/3 each year (by multiplying the current issuance by a reduction factor of 2/3). Osmosis was the first protocol to use a [“thirding” token release schedule](https://medium.com/osmosis/osmo-token-distribution-ae27ea2bb4db) and heavily inspired Stargaze’s design.

For some background on using token incentives to bootstrap new networks, check out this great [tweet thread](https://twitter.com/cdixon/status/1440026947036356619?s=20) by Chris Dixon.

!["Thirding" release schedule](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TwRgLvwwmYuxQ8c4BqR3f.png?height=768&width=1024)

Stargaze will start with an initial supply of 1 billion STARS. An additional 1 billion STARS will be issued the first year. With this "thirding" schedule, the issuance for the following year will be 667M STARS. This leads to an **asymptotic max supply of 4 billion STARS**.

![Total supply formula](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4zhWsUYN9KbC12rOFyAZM.png?height=126&width=1284)

![Issuance calculations](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ooIF-U44MYirt21oEg4LL.png?height=1542&width=1630)

Stargaze starts off decentralized on day one with a genesis supply that distributes the majority of the tokens to community members. The Foundation will hold a strategic reserve of tokens, and will drive adoption of the protocol by delegating to validators, onboarding creators, and providing grants for ecosystem development.

![Community-focused genesis supply](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZTtjhTqZNqm1rNESQq8j2.png?height=768&width=1024)

After 5 years, the initial distribution is only 27.6% of the entire token supply. This issuance schedule allows Stargaze to grow and adapt its ownership to new creators, curators, validators, delegators, and other stakeholders.

![Genesis supply vs. new issuance after 5 years](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k_VH9Rk86klZ7IXo2ZbKC.png?height=768&width=1024)

Tokens for seed investors, validators, founders, and advisors are locked up for 1 year, and linearly vest after that for another 6 months - 1 year. This helps align values with the the development team and early stakeholders.

## The Airdrop

The goal of the Stargaze airdrop is to reach the most active participants in the Cosmos ecosystem. Stakers and liquidity providers are more likely to be more active than just token holders. Therefore, Stargaze is doing its airdrop to a mix of network participants:

* **ATOM stakers**
* **OSMO stakers or liquidity providers**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Cosmos Hub**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Osmosis**
* **Stargaze validator stakers on Regen Network**

For each role above, you will be able to claim **2,453 STARS**. Distributing a fixed amount is in the spirit of the original Uniswap airdrop, giving every user more or less an equal starting point. In order to claim your airdrop, you have to perform 4-5 actions on Stargaze when it launches. If you have used [Osmosis](http://osmosis.zone/) or [Rabbithole](https://rabbithole.gg/), you’re already familiar with performing tasks to claim tokens. Some claimable actions include bidding on NFTs, staking, and voting in governance.

Some minimums were put in place to prevent dust accounts and those attempting to game airdrops:

* **ATOM staker: 5 ATOM minimum staked**
* **OSMO staker: 50 OSMO minimum staked**

Furthermore, delegations to centralized exchange validators were excluded.

For example, if you’re an ATOM staker and OSMO LP, and meet the above minimums, then your airdrop reward is 4,906 STARS.

Osmosis liquidity providers get the airdrop regardless if LP tokens are bonded or not.

Airdrop claimable amounts start decaying 4 months after the launch of the NFT market. The decaying process linearly decreases the claimable amount for another 4 months.

![Airdrop must be claimed to prevent decay](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3_QgqhG1LETOtyBdL0a7P.png?height=768&width=1024)

After the airdrop claim period, unclaimed STARS are sent to the Community Pool.

Snapshots were taken on Oct 11th, 2021 from Cosmos Hub, Osmosis, and Regen Network.

To see how much STARS you’re eligible to claim, please visit <https://stargaze.zone/airdrop>.

***Note: Airdrops won’t be claimable until after Phase 3 of launch. Please see Phase 3 below.***

http://stargaze.zone/airdrop

## Reward Distribution

New token reward distribution will be optimized to facilitate the operations of the NFT market.

The initial breakdown per block will be:

![Per block distribution](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UzjJ1v4qZ-bF5zw1BY9kr.png?height=768&width=1024)

All chain parameters can be changed via governance vote. Everything suggested in this post are sensible defaults. We expect governance to adapt and change the protocol as it matures.

### NFT Incentives

45% of block rewards are set aside for NFT bidding and staking incentives. Token holders will be able to earn yield by bidding and staking on NFTs for certain periods of time. An upcoming post will outline this mechanic in detail.

If governance determines that NFT incentives are too high for achieving the desired effect of the protocol, they may direct these incentives towards the Community Pool where they can be spent later.

### Staking Rewards

As per the course with proof-of-stake networks, validators (node operators) earn rewards for securing the network. They also accept delegations from token holders, and charge a commission of 5% or greater for providing the service.

Nearly 100 validators were selected to join mainnet after 3 testnets, 2 of which were incentivized. They will earn 35% of all block rewards.

### Developer Rewards

Initially, 15% of block rewards will go to fund the team that contributes to the development of Stargaze. Each account gets a specific weight set by governance. When a developer is no longer contributing, governance can choose to modify their weight or remove their allocation.

### Community Pool

The Community Pool is the main DAO that operates the network. It is responsible for voting on parameter changes, software upgrades, community matters, and more. It will receive 5% of all block rewards.

## Phased Launch

Since Stargaze is a layer 1 blockchain with many moving parts, it will launch in phases.

* **Phase 0: Chain launch with 0% inflation (Oct 29th)**
* **Phase 1: Liquidity pools on [Osmosis](http://osmosis.zone/) and [Gravity DEX](https://cosmos.network/gravity-dex/)**
* **Phase 2: Governance proposal to enable inflation**
* **Phase 3: Web app launch with first NFT drop**

More details about the liquidity pools will be forthcoming. Please follow us on social media (links below) for updates. They are planned for 2-3 weeks after Phase 0, and have to go through governance to be funded via the Community Pool.

New tokens won’t be issued until after Phase 2, when inflation kicks in. At this time you’ll be able to stake STARS at [stargaze.zone](http://stargaze.zone/) via [Keplr Wallet](http://keplr.app/).

Phase 3 is expected to be completed before the end of the year. Airdrops will be claimable starting in this phase.

## Follow Us

To follow along with Stargaze developments, check us out on Twitter at <https://twitter.com/StargazeZone>, and join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE).

https://twitter.com/StargazeZone

[https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE](https://discord.gg/QeJWCrE)

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Why don’t I have an airdrop? I staked ATOM.**

The airdrop is only available to those that staked with non-centralized exchange validators. Staking with the following centralized exchanges ***do not*** qualify: Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, Huobi, CoinOne, and OKEX.

**I staked 0.1 ATOM, where is my airdrop?**

You must have staked at least 5 ATOM or 50 OSMOS to qualify.

**I had my Osmosis LP tokens unbonded on Oct 11th. Do I still qualify?**

Yes.

Happy Stargazing ✨🔭

title: MulticoinCapital领投的DeFi借贷Timeswap测试
body:
## Timeswap 是一个受 Uniswap AMM 机制启发，采用三变量 AMM 机制的借贷协议，主要特点包括：无需许可、市场驱动的借贷利息和所需抵押品、固定期限资金池等。三变量 AMM 机制满足 XYZ=K （X 为主要池，Y 为利率池，Z 为抵押率池），池的利率和抵押率由该三变量 AMM 决定，而不基于任何价格预言机。目前已完成种子轮融资。Multicoin Capital 领投，Mechanism Capital 和 Defiance Capital 参投，暂未披露具体融资金额。今天开通测试的第一天。

操作如下：

 
 

**步骤一：先去rinkeby水龙头领eth油费[Rinkeby: Authenticated Faucet](https://weibo.cn/sinaurl?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffaucet.rinkeby.io%2F)。根据他要求填写地址转推即可**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GlIxNQRO4jCUC7hIG8UJT.jpg?height=499&width=1400)

**​ 
 **

**步骤二：[app.timeswap.io/#faucet](https://weibo.cn/sinaurl?u=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.timeswap.io%2F%23faucet)   打开time官网链接小狐狸钱包rinkeby测试网，领取测试代币** 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YNl5v8r0_XC5euy6ns59n.jpg?height=721&width=1400)

步骤三：网页左侧能看到目前提供四个交易对，每个交易对下的池子。因为我们领取的是DAI和MATIC所以选择前两个，在步骤一如果领取的ETH多的话也可以做跟ETH的借贷

配对的标准池命名约定是，第一个令牌是借出/借入的资产，第二个令牌是抵押品。例如：**DAI-MATIC 池**意味着DAI 是资产，MATIC 是抵押品。

有两种贷款选项 -默认**贷款**和**自定义风险贷款。同样借款也是默认借款和自定义风险借款。**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/b9BsMgmuzXwMQBrwgBUYX.jpg?height=847&width=534)

​默认的是50%设置直接Lend就可以了，如果是自定义风险贷款，滑动上面APR，你将能够看到估计的 APR、抵押因素、到期金额和保险，以防 100% 违约。APR 越高，到期时的预期金额越高，保险范围就越低，反之亦然。

**步骤四：在dashboard你能够实时查看到期时将收到的资产金额DAI，以及以抵押令牌形式提供的保险，如果借款人 100% 违约，您将能够获得保险。如果到期可以点击右侧的claim取出**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wupFjsVE_IYAJMKdxkIdg.jpg?height=432&width=1400)

**​步骤五;借款的操作同上，选择APR低的同时如果违约赔付的保险金就高。例我借款100dai  以matic做抵押，选择APR3%如果违约赔付109MATIC.点击borrow 
 **

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MKuGNK9I8ZKLeqo7yNHuj.jpg?height=867&width=533)

同样在Dashboard看到你的债务情况点击Repay all  可以偿还全部债务

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/L8g5knckiYEW06YTI8LRq.jpg?height=693&width=1361)

 
 

最后：在borrow里我红框标记里你可以看到你借款产生的一个NFT直接可以在opensea打开，为了尝试我打开后挂出去最低只能挂10ETH  当然这是测试网络的哈（目前没什么用）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VLIizQiwA50huIL9Xyr1T.jpg?height=358&width=1109)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/riSSCe0V530FxS8VZJb07.jpg?height=864&width=1249)

​

 
 

     最近以体验项目为主，顺带薅羊毛。另外会更新一些BI的看法，游戏目前有专人在盯有相对可以的也会提示。

title: 1999: 7.17 A Network Implodes, Another Explodes
body:
1998

It began in Southeast Asia. Past excesses in the emerging markets imploded.

It spread through first the currencies, bonds and then local stock markets. Financial contagion spread to world's real economies.

Many people, far from the markets, suffered, starved, or died. There were bailouts, financial aid, austerity deals and interest rate cuts. The crisis faded, and a new fever began to spread.

Networks of the markets funded a new network, the Internet.

Mr. Market, high on bailouts, jumped off cliffs to build rockets on the way down.

The same networks which spread disaster last year, had a fever for the future.

Like every year, this year had crises and tragedies, but it also had clues. The year’s clues included rockets and future tech giants.

Google is founded in Menlo Park, California. Tencent is founded in Shenzhen, China. AOL bought Netscape for 4.2B USD. Microsoft was sued by the US DOJ and 20 US states for an antitrust case.

Ice was found in the Moon's polar craters, enough for a future colony. Japan launched a probe to Mars.

A Russian rocket launched from Kazakhstan, carried the first part of the International Space Station, the 21 ton Zarya Module. The Space Shuttle Endeavour launches the first American section of the International Space Station, 'Unity'. It docks with Zarya.

The Beastie Boys released a hit, 'Intergalactic'.

The sky was not the limit. The Internet was coming.

**2877 Earth, The Necklace, The Marketplace Square**


"They've had eyes on us the moment we got off the transport. What were your instructions from your grandfather, besides not opening the package and sneaking a look?"

"I was told that someone would meet me in the market. That I would hand it over to them, and that would be it."

"Change of plans, I have to get information from whoever shows up. The reality is that person not going to be "THE person". We'll see."

"If they see we don't have the item on us, what happens?"

"My guess is the recipient doesn't know either just like you were kept in the dark. I want you to know one more thing, I won't let anything happen to your Grandfather or family. But it's my job to take it back home."

She looked at me, realizing the danger of not delivering but she said nothing.

The Marketplace was busy, the locals were selling to regulars and visitors. There were performances and event feeds in the quieter pockets between the clusters of shops and tourist attractions.

We were both wearing tactical underneath, and I snuck on a few items from the diplomatic bag. I didn't ask for anyone from the regular detail at the consulate. I wasn't there long enough to know who to rely on.

I'm sure most of the consulate's security staff was vetted but none of them served with me. That's the kind of help I wanted.

We'll play tourists, with a shoulder bag.

I see a group walking through the crowd towards us. They walk different, and carry themselves the way my crew would.

They didn't just send one person.

title: 生气骂人的果报很严重，一定要记住！
body:
人世间，有一种情绪，叫做生气，任何人都无法摆脱。

人一旦带着自己的情绪，就容易失控，言行举止都会造下恶业。

所以，千万不要小看生气的果报，一定要记住！

**一、人越生气，福气越少**

**佛经上说：“世间之疾莫过猛风，怨念之徵复速于彼，一切如来、金刚天等及五通仙不能救护。”**

发脾气叫做火烧功德林， 一把怒火把一切福德烧尽 。

从前有位学佛的人，苦心修行很多年，但是生活却依然穷困，甚至妻离子散。

他不明白自己潜心修行为何还会这样，于是跑去问大师。

大师对他说：“那是因为你常常发脾气，即使佛菩萨有再大的神通，也敌不过你造下的罪业啊！”

**这世上，有一种永远亏本的生意，那就是发脾气。当你生气的时候，福气就远离了你！**

坏脾气就是心魔，你控制不住它，它便将你吞噬。

脾气越好，福报越多；脾气越差，坎坷越多。那些看似心大，有福的人，不过就是能忍。

**二、人越生气，财运越差**

**古语云：一念嗔心起，百万障门开。**

这句话是说只要片刻间生起愤怒和怨恨，那么千千万万的罪恶就会滋生出来。

一嗔一地狱，人一旦生气，不但赶走了财气，也造下了恶业。

雍正年间，在京城的黄金地段开了一家客栈。

客栈开张后每天生意火爆，门庭若市，而应接不暇的老板服务态度却越来越差，常和别人生气，甚至吵架。

一天，前来吃饭的一位客人不小心打碎了一个瓷碗。客栈老板不但不接受客人的道歉，还不依不饶的要求客人赔偿。

自此后，客栈便常被官府找麻烦，因此生意越来越差。最后，客栈老板只好卖了店面，悻悻而去。

原来，那位打碎瓷碗的客人是朝中某位大臣，客栈老板不依不饶的态度惹怒了他，因此指示官府暗地破坏了客栈的生意。

**所谓“和气生财”。**

如果常常生气，不仅会赶走自己的福运财气，也会招来祸病缠身。

所以，不论是做人，还是做事，都要学会控制脾气，放下自己心中的怒气，才能留住财气。

**要知道，你的脾气里，藏着你的财气。**

**三、骂人最消福禄**

**俗话说：一言折尽平生福。**

祸从口出，骂人最消福禄，如果不及时停止，福禄会越来越少。

从前有位大师，曾在禅修期间，眼前总会出现一只白色的狗。后来，他通过禅观，意识到这是自己过去业报的呈现：

上一世，他曾骂过别人是狗，结果导致他五百世都沦为做狗。最后一世的时候，他看到一群人在吃饭，饥饿的他便趁人不注意，跑过去偷吃。

后来被人们发现，活埋了他。恰巧阿难尊者看到了这一切，慈悲的将他超度了。

有句话说的好：**一个愤怒的人只会破口大骂，却看不见任何东西。**

人们在气头上说的话，往往是口不择言的，不在意眼前的后果，更别说因果报应。

**万物皆有佛性，万事都有因果。千万不要图一时的痛快，生怨起怒，因怒结恶，毁掉自己的功德。**

人生苦短，世事艰难。

生活中，谁都难免会遇到不顺心的事情。

而生气骂人，便成了人们最常见的一种情绪。

却不知，生气骂人带来的果报非常严重，不仅离福气越来越远，甚至会给自己带来祸患。

**《黄帝内经》中记载：“百病生于气也。”**

爱生气的人很难健康，更难长寿。

生活中的大部分不愉快，其实都是和自己过不去，我们决定不了别人，但为了自己，为了健康，至少要做到控制自己的情绪。

**命是自己的，运是自己的，生活与修行也是自己的，**

**活着，千万别生气，别让脾气，阻挡了福气！请您转发分享，弘扬传统文化！**

 
 

**南无阿弥陀佛!**

title: 八种话不要乱讲，因果重！
body:
古人说：“覆水难收”。讲话就像泼水，泼出去的水无法再收回，讲过的话也一样收不回来，所以一句话要出口以前，不能不慎思。

一、丧志的话不能讲

有的人经常喜欢讲丧志、洩气的话，其实人生应该接受别人的鼓励，即使没有人为我打气，也要自我鼓励。

二、负气的话不能讲

人在生气时，往往不自觉的讲出负气的话来，有时是伤害别人，有时也伤害了自己。人在受气的时候，最好是保持冷静，不要随便发言，因为气头上所说的话，往往很难听，因此不能讲。

三、抱怨的话不能讲

人在不满意的时候，经常说出一些抱怨的话，怨恨主管，怨恨朋友，甚至怨恨家人。你经常讲抱怨的话，被别人听到以后，借题发挥、搬弄是非，说你要对付这个人，要对付那个人，最后自己自食苦果，何苦来哉。

四、损人的话不能讲

有的人轻浮，对人不够尊重、包容，经常在言谈之间讲些损人的话，有时候是损人利己，有时是损人不利己。

五、自夸的话不能讲

有的人在言谈之间，喜欢宣传自己、自我标榜、自我夸大，别人听了必定不能认同，所以自我夸大并无实益，反而自我损伤。人要伟大，必须做出一些伟大的事业;伟大是要别人讲的，不能自我称大，自我还是谦卑为好。

六、不实的话不能讲

佛家的“五戒”，“妄语戒”是其中之一。妄语就是“见言不见、不见言见，是的说非、非的说是”，也就是所谓“说谎”，是不实在的话。

七、机密的话不能讲

人事之间都有很多机密，包括家庭的、公司的;吾人应该养成不随便乱说机密的习惯，你要对外发表机密之前，先要想到可能引发的不良后果，知道严重性，就不会胡乱开口了。

八、隐私的话不能讲

每个人都有隐私，自己的隐私当然不希望被人知道，别人的隐私自己也不能讲。就算你揭发别人的隐私，没有引起对方反击，但已暴露了自己不厚道的性格。人住房子，不但为了遮阳蔽雨，也为了安全，最主要的，是为了保护隐私;人穿衣服，一方面是为了保暖，同时也是为了遮羞蔽体，掩藏自己的私密。所以人要互相尊重，不可以暴露别人的隐私。

除上以外，当然还有很多不当的话不能讲，甚至有很多不当的事不能做、不当的行为不能有。
